author: {'steamid': '76561198294655770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 2697, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2697, 'last_played': 1617484994}
review:
[h1]ゲーム評価[/h1] 
ゲームとして綺麗にまとまった良作アクションです。
2Dドットゲームが好きなら買っても失敗することはないでしょう。

全体的に操作が軽快で、難易度もちょうど良いくらいなので
アクションが苦手な方でも楽しめると思います。

自分はシャンティ初プレイだったので、作中のネタが全く分からなかったんですが
登場するキャラがどれも魅力的だったので、分からないなりに楽しめました。

普通にやるならシリーズの最初から順番にやった方がいいと思います。

ストーリー自体は展開の激しいドタバタ系なので
海外のアニメ映画だと思ってみた方が分かりやすいかも。

[h1]言語について[/h1] 
日本語対応されていないので、自分は以下のサイトを見ながらやりました。
雰囲気の出し方が作品にマッチしているのでかなり読みやすいです。

・「Shantae　and　the　Pirate's　Curse」適当和訳セリフ集
http://scrap-cliff.sakuraweb.com/other/shantae_to_JP_top2.html

[h1]トロコン難易度：★★★☆☆[/h1] 
アクションゲームの実績としてはかなり簡単な方です。

ノーダメボス撃破、スピードランなど面倒な実績もありますが
全ての装備を所持した状態で始まるPirateModeなら苦戦はしないと思います。

PirateModeはクリア後に解禁されるので
1周目は物語を楽しんで、2周目から実績の回収をするのがオススメです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198119008915', 'num_games_owned': 431, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 734, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 734, 'last_played': 1616722651}
review:
Ótimo jogo de plataforma e exploração no estilo metroidvania.
Shantae é uma serie de jogos com bastante tempo q ainda não tem um grande reconhecimento, combinado gameplay de plataformas e um pouco de exploração no estilo metroidvania, muito indicado ser vc for fã de um desses estilos de jogos, lembrado q Shantae and the Pirate's Curse é um porte de 3ds então não espere uma obra prima no quesito gráficos mesmo sendo pixel art

author: {'steamid': '76561198115820587', 'num_games_owned': 3074, 'num_reviews': 351, 'playtime_forever': 993, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 993, 'last_played': 1492877046}
review:
Plateforme aventure, et petite déception.

Troisième opus de la série, cette fois on abandonne le côté Metroid-like pour quelque chose de plus classique, c'est à dire un enchainement de niveaux disponibles via un hub. L’univers est toujours aussi cool, les musiques sont splendides (Jake Kaufman), Shantae et ses amies toujours aussi sexys.

Malgré ça, le level design est décevant. Les niveaux sont trop courts, trois ou quatre tableaux puis un donjon à chaque fois. Pour vaincre les boss, suffit de bourrer à l'aveugle. Quelques bonus planqués ça et là, mais rien de ouf, tout est extrêmement facile à dénicher. La progression se fait de manière routinière, point de surprise, on fait un niveau, on gagne un objet qui donne une option de gameplay en plus, puis niveau suivant, etc... La maniabilité dont j'avais adoré la rigueur dans l'opus précédent, est grandement simplifiée: les timings précis pour augmenter son DPS et ses mouvements, byebye, les magies et les transformations ont disparu elles-aussi.

On est là face à un bon jeu de plateforme, ultra mignon et plutôt agréable à jouer, mais vraiment trop classique si on le compare à son grand frère.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002449672', 'num_games_owned': 324, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 709, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 633, 'last_played': 1616258495}
review:
Отличное продолжение и завершение трилогии!
Но, получается, у главной героини самая маленькая грудь среди остальных женских персонажей.

Из плюсов всё та же улучшенная анимация, завёрнутая в сочную графику; простой, в хорошем смысле, сюжет без йe6лu мозгов, но с интересными поворотами; компактность всего происходящего (читай как не будешь запариваться бегать километры туда-сюда по бэктрекам) и, самое главное, разнообразие в геймплее! Уровни-перебивки с побегом из Дворца; спасение протухшей подруги и другие - моё почтение)
Сильно зашло, как создатели обогатили, развили и обосновали способности Шантей! Как говорится, в лучших традициях продолжения.
Ну и музыка, чуть было вновь не забыл про неё! Что OST из Risky's Revenge, что из данной части - моментально залетели в плейлист!
Для меня всё тем же минусом остаётся спермотоксикозность происходящего в катсценах. Опять же, это чисто субъективная херня и в принципе понятно, зачем разрабы поступили так)
Думаю, если они выпустят "премиум" версию с голыми персонажами без цензуры, то срубят на школьниках ещё бОльшую кассу)

author: {'steamid': '76561198132503739', 'num_games_owned': 601, 'num_reviews': 548, 'playtime_forever': 1120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1120, 'last_played': 1616168881}
review:
[b]My playtime:[/b] 18.7h (based on Steam, 100% achievement)
[b]Grindy Achievement(s):[/b] No.
[b]Optional Achievement(s):[/b] Yes (28 achievements).
[b]Difficult Achievement(s):[/b] No (the last dungeon might be hard to some people).

[h1]Intro[/h1]
[b]Shantae and the Pirate's Curse[/b] is the third installment of the [b]Shantae[/b] series and the sequel of [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/277890/Shantae_Riskys_Revenge__Directors_Cut/][b]Shantae: Risky's Revenge - Director's Cut[/b][/url]. To be honest, I never played any [b]Shantae[/b] games before, so this review will be based on that.

[b]Pros:[/b]
- 6 islands to explore, each with a unique theme and dungeon
- Unique and challenging boss fight with adjustable difficulty

[b]Cons:[/b]
- Sometimes it's hard to know where to go next

[h1]Should you buy this game?[/h1]
[b]Yes.[/b]
[i]If you like Metroidvania games, buy this on a sale.[/i]

[hr][/hr]
[h1]In-Depth Review[/h1]

[h3]Graphics[/h3]
The game seems to have its graphics made without keeping other elements in mind. The use of sub-pixel animation to simulate movement in the sprites makes all characters look lively, but it soon to be overthrown by the blurry background - the outdoor scenery looks like JPEG images that are zoomed to the maximum, making them pixelated. This combination of detailed and blurry pixels makes it hard for your eye to choose which one to focus on. Luckily, the indoors, especially dungeons, are not suffering from the same fate.

Dialogue boxes also look lazily done with the simple look. It looks like the one that you see from default RPG Maker dialogue boxes, except that it's way worse - it has a blue background with a white outline and an [i]Arial[/i]-like font in it. The design looks out of place with the detailed pixel art and could use some redesigning.

[h3]Story[/h3]
The story references the previous game a lot. I didn't understand what the character was talking about most of the time and there were even some times when I was wondering whether the game was referencing the previous game or not. Although the main story can be understood without playing the previous game, it's still better to play the previous game first to fully understand the story. As for the story itself, the writing is done well; it focuses on the exploration theme while not making it too serious at the same time.

[h3]The Game[/h3]
[b]Gameplay[/b]
Different enemies are available on each island, each with a different attack pattern. It can be challenging to pass through each area for the first time because of this - you can even die before you reach the checkpoint if you aren't careful. Trying out how to proceed without getting killed will be your main concern as you play the game, especially if you are attempting to beat the game with only 2 hearts.

Sometimes, progression isn't clear enough. Although most main quests are obvious, sometimes the game will ask you to collect some items without any pointers where to look. This might give an impression that you have to explore all previously explored islands to find the items, although the truth is, you just need to talk to some NPCs for hints. It took me a while to understand that NPCs have different dialogues after completing some side quests and that they will give you some info on your main quest.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2429946426 

[b]Combat[/b]
The game has an adjustable difficulty. You start at 2 hearts, which equals to 8 HP, and can be increased by collecting [i]Heart Squids[/i] and melting them into extra hearts in the town. It can be challenging to beat the game with only 2 hearts, especially if you meet an enemy that can hit you for 6 HP in one hit. Luckily, most normal enemies have a certain attack pattern so you just need to learn their pattern to avoid getting hit.

Bosses, on the other hand, are way more challenging if you try to limit yourself. They have unique attack patterns and some of the attacks are hard to avoid if you don't know what to do. Luckily, you can adjust the difficulty of the boss as well. Hardcore players can try to finish the boss without taking damage and using items, although casual players who don't care about achievements can do both. As for me, I tried to beat them without taking damage and using items at first, although it proves to be difficult to accomplish as you progress without giving up on the other one - I ended up using items to defeat most end-game bosses to make them easier to beat.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2429944431 

[b]Length and Difficulty[/b]
I finished the game in 14.1h and spent the rest of my playtime to finish the speedrun achievements. Most of my playtime on that 14.1h was spent restarting the game to defeat bosses without taking damage and clearing a certain area without dying, which can cut the playtime by a lot of hours if you choose to ignore all that.

As I said before, the difficulty is adjustable - you can use items and have more hearts to make the game easier. There is an achievement to finish the game without adding extra hearts and defeat all bosses without taking damage though, so achievement hunters might find the game to be more annoying to finish. Moreover, some people might find the last dungeon to be difficult since you need to execute a lot of actions at nearly the same time to clear the area.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2429945371 

[b]Problems[/b]
The game has confusing tutorials. It might explain the mechanics properly, but the game never states which button to press - the most that the game will tell you is something like "press the lamp button", which you must figure out from the controls on your own. Lastly, saving doesn't seem to recover your health although reloading your save will fully recover it.

[h1]Specs[/h1]
Intel Core i5-9300H 2.40GHz, 8GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650

[h1]Conclusion[/h1]
Despite not understanding most stories and references, you actually can enjoy the game if you don't care much about the story. The gameplay makes up for it with its unique enemies and challenging bosses, although the control might feel stiff at first due to the character's slow attacking speed. Luckily, it doesn't take long before you can upgrade the attack speed into an acceptable one, and when it does, the game will feel right at home for you. It's a solid Metroidvania game for both casual and hardcore gamers with adjustable difficulty.

[quote]Visit SaveOrQuit.com for detailed game reviews, posted daily![/quote]

review:
Greatly enjoyed, amazing gameplay and easy mechanics to learn but the plot and characters really hinge on you at least playing Risky's Revenge. This was my first game in the series, and I expect to play many more, but this doesn't feel like the correct starting point, plot-wise, for a variety of reasons.
Pick up Risky's Revenge first, then play this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054690449', 'num_games_owned': 1377, 'num_reviews': 182, 'playtime_forever': 1219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1219, 'last_played': 1613754609}
review: Many consider this to be the best Shantae game and they have good reason to.  This game combines the best of both the GBC Shantae and Risky's Revenge with a little more balance and polish to round things out.  I do recommend at least playing the latter before this one due to story, but the former one will also allow you to pick up on easter eggs.  Difficulty-wise, it's definitely harder than Risky's Revenge, but without the hardware limitations of the first game.  There's also replayability with Pirate Mode and unlocking all the wallpapers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061640074', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 246, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1691250929}
review: I purchased this because I thought it had a lot better graphics than most of the action games. A girl who used to be a genie is fighting against pirates using her hair as a weapon. Action games usually only keep me interested for a few minutes at a time, but this seems like it is more replayable than other action games. When I look at most of the other popular action games, there are a lot of people saying that they are way too difficult, but this game is a little bit less challenging.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084385268', 'num_games_owned': 4156, 'num_reviews': 281, 'playtime_forever': 1058, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1058, 'last_played': 1613187302}
review:
The game can be completed in about 7 hours. Like its prequel(Risky's Revenge) its not a long game but this is better paced than the last game.

Again its a 2D platformer but they improved the graphics Artsyle AND ingame to a more HD version. Although the sprites are still low poly, the added screen realstate made them look cleaner.  They differentiated some things due to what happened in the previous game.

Storywise, there are more connections here to the previous game than to the 1st game(Shantae) so I would suggest you play the 2nd game first(Risky's Revenge). If you can't handle the DS graphics and artsyle though you might have a hard time with the story\lore and jokes about it.


Pros
- Improved on the previous game on
- ART
- Gameplay
- Pacing
- Better use of items with explanations
-

Needs improvement\Cons
- None

author: {'steamid': '76561198024423322', 'num_games_owned': 1307, 'num_reviews': 203, 'playtime_forever': 704, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 704, 'last_played': 1611952912}
review:
Shantae and the Pirate's Curse is a fine game. No bugs encountered, nice graphics and a great soundtrack as well as a some nice dungeons and a good portion of humor/fan service. Other than that, I didn't really like the backtracking even though the game tends to give you enough hints if you're stuck at some point. Also, some unlockables are well too well hidden in my opinion and the difficulty spike at the end caught me off guard. 

Not a must play for me, but I can see why people like the series now.

author: {'steamid': '76561198134089309', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 509, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 508, 'last_played': 1617653109}
review:
this game is pretty good

+omega cute girls 
+shantae dances with the magic lamp
+still one of the best soundtracks in the series. absolutely bussin
+banger dungeon designs still
+an actually good map for the first time
+backtracking is far easier with pirate flares and risky
+it feels like you move way faster than the games prior
+bolo is horny again which was arguably the best part of the first game

=no transformations like the other games but you get cool pirate swag

-the airship area kinda sucks because of how long winded it is but you get to run fast sometimes
-no transformations means no monkey bullet and like come on man
-it took me like an hour into the game before i got used to how you navigate the inventory
-it says "eit game" which is pretty funny admittedly

review:
Best Shantae game. Risky's tools are perfect for this game and so fun to play with. It is also, in my opinion, the hardest game (I'm looking at you Mud Bog Island).
Definitely a must buy if you're a fan of Metroidvania games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198873962315', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 296, 'last_played': 1694480714}
review: Shantae and the Pirate's Curse is by far my favorite metroidvania. I know there are technically better options, but what keeps me coming back to this game is the fast paced action, great writing, good puzzles, and subversion of standard Shantae gameplay. This game has some hilarious comedy, probably the best of the Shantae games. It doesn't take itself too seriously, but doesn't try to be too cutesy like Half-Genie Hero or Seven Sirens. Would highly recommend this game to anyone looking for a good metroidvania, or 2D platformer in general.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996633876', 'num_games_owned': 1153, 'num_reviews': 370, 'playtime_forever': 870, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 870, 'last_played': 1543716504}
review:
Pirate's Curse is another one of those 'perfect games' I think where the stars align and pretty much everything lines up as perfectly as you can expect. I'll explain.

Firstly, the art is phenomenal. I think most all the sprites and stuff were made by Inti Creates? This was a very smart decision because it turns out Inti Creates has a ton of extremely talented artists, and it's why this game looks great, they I think recycled most of the stuff that was used in Risky's Revenge (which is also an alright game) and made some new stuff as well for Pirate's Curse. There's also some really good splash art and CGs which mesh nicely with the sprites themselves.

Secondly, the game plays really really well. Pirate's Curse is a metroidvania platformer, and you spend most of the game running around picking up items and finding other items and occasionally doing a puzzle or an item puzzle or whatever you need to do to progress. Usually it's pretty clear what you need to do every step of the way, the game either will hint you towards the next thing, or maybe you have to figure it out yourself. I don't recall needing a walkthrough or whatever, which I think is important for one of these games.

One of the most important things in one of these games is simply that it tells you what to do, where to go, and your objectives. Pirate's Curse summarises everything on the, uh, 'world map' I suppose when you're selecting a stage, from the collectables you need to health powerups you missed, and I think that's just great. There's fortunately not too much stuff you need to wander around the gameworld to collect, and it never really gets tiresome, hunting down secrets and such.

The characters in Pirate's Curse are pretty wonderful and clearly defined. Shantae's always cheerful and upbeat and she makes a good foil for Risky who is always gloomy and pessimistic. Most of the other characters are there to help you out in one way or another and a couple of them have nice neat little stories or arcs I'm sure you'll appreciate when you get to them. Several characters reprise their roles from the last game and it's great to see them all again.

This game has bosses, and they all look great courtesy of the fluid spritework, kind of reminds me of a Metal Slug game in that everything's huge, pixely and animated fluidly. Not much to say really, they're all fun to fight I think. Some are a bit longer than others, and it helps to use the powerups and stuff you can find around the place, but I managed to make it through the game without really using any of them except the hair upgrades.

There's a bunch of 'stuff' you get throughout the game that powers up Shantae, like any good metroidvania. Stuff that lets you get around more easily, items that help you defeat enemies more easily, and sometimes stuff that just lets you progress. And like any good metroidvania you'll probably be able to look back on how weak you were at the start and laugh, which is always fun.

Shantae and the Pirate's Curse is just a really fun game, I don't really know what else to say other than that. Buy it if you like running around, jumping, solving puzzle platformer puzzles, and fighting bosses.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990036156', 'num_games_owned': 536, 'num_reviews': 506, 'playtime_forever': 947, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 947, 'last_played': 1607894938}
review:
tl;dr: Recommended, but only if you're willing to play the shitty predecessor first.

Similar to Risky's revenge, this game features massive improvements over its predecessor. These improvements come in the form of improvements to the graphics, flow, sound, music, map, level design, and controls. Improvements are across the board and there is even a tiny amount of voice acting this time around. These improvements all coalesce into a decent metroidvania with sexy characters that is otherwise unremarkable. The one thing holding this game back is the story, specifically the fact that it is a sequel to a bad game that is a sequel to a horrendously unplayable game. This means that unless you're willing to at least play the predecessor, you'll be left out in the cold as far as the plot is concerned. At 15 hours long this game isn't particularly long but in my opinion it was an enjoyable time nonetheless. It is also worth mentioning the idiotic way in which this game handles health. Save points do not heal more than half a heart and there is literally only one place in the entire game that will provide you will a healing point. To compensate for this you can hoard healing items... or you can simply die, in which case you respawn with full health??? How the hell did that get past QA?

author: {'steamid': '76561198212769343', 'num_games_owned': 466, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 2549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2310, 'last_played': 1607459284}
review:
Shantae is a solid Metroidvania game. It's short but sweet. Has great Metal Slug styled graphics with catchy soundtracks. The story is interesting with some funny jokes. For completionists, it's not hard to complete everything. I managed to get everything in my first try.

There aren't many flaws. Some levels are somewhat frustrating but not enough to give up. With experience hard parts end up being fairly easy. The other flaw is perhaps the bosses could be more creative.

If you like Metroidvania games this is definitely a game you should get.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032542390', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 453, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1606330030}
review:
일단 전작을 한 사람으로써 매우 좋습니다.

캐릭터가 가야할 방향성이 정해져 있지만 유도는 매우 자연스럽고

전작의 스토리와 이어지는것이 아예 말도 안되는것도 아니며 맵 곳곳에 숨겨진 새롭게 얻어야 해금되는 루트 등

매우 잘 녹여낸것같아 좋습니다.

길을 잃었을 경우에는 획득한 아이템에 ~를 찾아가서 물어보라는 등 가이드가 꾸준히 되어있다.

전작의 경우 에너지(MP)를 사용하여 기술을 사용한 반면

이번작품의 경우 아이템의 형태를 취하는데 사용 후 일정시간동안 활성화된 후 사라진다.

전작은 상시 발동하여 추가적인 데미지 보조를 해주었지만 이번 작은 굳이 사용 자체를 안해도 상관없게 해놓은것 같다.(아직 클리어는 안함 근데 충분히 가능할것같음)

상점에서 기본 공격(머리카락 공격)과 공격속도를 증가를 구입하기만 해도 충분히 싸우면서 클리어 가능하다.

리스키 부츠(아이템)을 얻는 순간 맵 이동속도가 장난이 아니게 되며 소닉마냥 몹을 처리하며 이동하는 기분이 꽤 좋다(특정구간)

워프존같은 섬에서 섬으로의 이동은 불가능하지만 포켓몬의 동굴탈출로프같은 탈출 아이템이 있기 때문에

섬에서 볼일이 끝나면 바로 탈출가능하기때문에 이동하는게 답답하게 느끼지지 않는다

좋은게임

캐릭터도 이쁨

author: {'steamid': '76561198063415504', 'num_games_owned': 591, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1606211388}
review:
Shameful technical issues on modern hardware for a game released only 5 years ago. I have a 1440p 144hz monitor. Not only does the game not go higher than 1080p, it won't even allow fullscreening on that monitor and doesn't auto-revert settings, which means attempting to fullscreen softlocked me and forced a restart. 

Much worse than that, the game speed is tied to the framerate, which means I either have to use a spare monitor or fiddle around with settings to lock my framerate to 60hz in order to not play at 2x speed.

WayForward is apparently aware of these issues and has been for years, yet refuses to patch or support them in any way.
No matter how good the game is (and I don't know yet, to be fair), it shouldn't have an Overwhelmingly Positive rating with these glaring issues, and WayForward shouldn't get your money for a game they refuse to support.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022314565', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 619, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 619, 'last_played': 1599007899}
review: Shantae and the Pirate's Curse is my favorite game in the series. While the original mechanic to turn into different animals is ordinary in most of the games, I felt like it was a refreshing change of pace to the series to add different platforming mechanics. The visuals to the characters are the best in the whole series in my opinion and I loved the story between Risky and Shantae. My only complaint would be that Shantae hardly ever wore the pirate bandana.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079617534', 'num_games_owned': 197, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1191, 'last_played': 1586898438}
review: My favorite of the Shantae games! If you enjoy sidescrolling platformers, you'll enjoy this. Good controls, mechanics, and gameplay with a fun silly story that doesn't take itself too seriously along with some really cute retro graphics. Played this through after playing through Risky's Revenge, and while I enjoy that one too this is the one that I would probably come back and replay more. The world is larger and the addition of Risky's equipment that you get through the game adds a lot of fun platforming elements. Basically the upgraded version of Risky's Revenge :P

author: {'steamid': '76561198014471076', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 184, 'playtime_forever': 693, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 693, 'last_played': 1527491697}
review: Out of all the other entries in the series, this one's absolutely the best. The different powers are a fresh take, the levels are colorful and interesting, and the story itself felt different enough from all the rest. The artstyle, music, writing, and side quests were fun, too. The biggest problems these games run into is how linear they are (do x to get y to use z to do x to get y ..... ) but overall they're fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119287255', 'num_games_owned': 335, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 453, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 452, 'last_played': 1654243945}

author: {'steamid': '76561197993777296', 'num_games_owned': 919, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 710, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 710, 'last_played': 1603643795}
review:
Le recensioni già parlavano da sé e non ho mai sentito nessuno che conoscesse la saga di Shantae e non ne parlasse sempre in modo elogiativo. Purtroppo non la conoscevo ed è il primo gioco che provo, ma penso che andrò a recuperare gli altri, se fossero anche meno belli di questo, sono delle potenziali perle.
Il gioco è un platform 2D con alcune piccole componenti di metroidvania, molto leggero come trama e ambientazione, ma dal gameplay davvero ben studiato e dal level design super accurato e appagante. Nonostante una struttura molto simile a quello che ci ha insegnato il genere, ogni volta ci sono delle meccaniche nuove e originali e delle sezioni interessanti.
Non fatevi scoraggiare dalle immagini di ragazzine tutte tette e chiappe: si tratta solo delle immagini che appaiono durante i dialoghi: la grafica delle parti giocate è diversa e molto bella.
Comunque, sembra che nel mondo di Shantae, quelle che comandano realmente sono le donne e di uomini ce ne sono pochi e tutti abbastanza stupidi o caricaturati :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198973835320', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 1499, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1363, 'last_played': 1623210280}

author: {'steamid': '76561198046737869', 'num_games_owned': 694, 'num_reviews': 198, 'playtime_forever': 416, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 398, 'last_played': 1602818691}
review:
Re-used assets, cringy writing, backtracking, obstacles places for the sole intent on annoying the player this is everything wrong with retro gaming, now wrapped in a low quality background art.

At best this is a sub-par platformer, and at worst it's an irritating slog through the same crap you've done. Not worth your money unless you want to jerk off to the fat-breasted sprites. Nothing makes me more sick than a game that expects me to orgasm to their content and that's essentially what the premise of this series is.

~6 hours with the help of some guides will get you to the bad ending. If you're a masochist, you can get all the dark magic to get the true ending or whatever. I don't care, I don't think it's worth it. I'm just happy to get this over with.

author: {'steamid': '76561198392553545', 'num_games_owned': 1031, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1333, 'last_played': 1602767802}
review:
圖文好讀版:
https://home.gamer.com.tw/creationDetail.php?sn=4949610

[h1] 前言: [/h1]

Shantae and the Pirate's Curse(桑塔與海盜的詛咒)，是一款像素風的2D橫版動作遊戲，原本是出在3DS平台，日後以HD高解析度版本移植到各大平台。

開頭我一定要先抱怨一下，我個人是像素風遊戲的愛好者，當初發現Shantae系列的評價不錯，所以就在某次特惠活動入手了本作以及前作Shantae: Risky's Revenge。結果我點開遊戲一看，所謂的「HD高解析度」，就只有把角色立繪HD化而已，其他部分則是直接把畫面拉大；這樣做的結果，就是像素顆粒變得又大又不精緻，某些靜態場景更是糊成一片……我沒有玩過Switch版的Shantae，或許在掌機上看起來會好一點吧。

不過我對於Shantae and the Pirate's Curse這款遊戲的怨言，也僅只於此。如果能夠接受它的畫面，就會發現網路上對它的好評絕非名不副實。

[h1] 偏簡單的遊戲難度 [/h1]

本作道具的強度非常誇張，我把幾個超強的道具列舉出來給大家看一下:

紅色藥水:把HP全部補滿
藍色藥水:死亡時自動復活，並把HP全部補滿
超級怪物牛奶:回復一些HP，在60秒內普攻傷害+10
超級鐵球:召喚三個會旋轉的鐵球，鐵球打中敵人會造成5點傷害
泡泡防護罩:可以擋住部分遠程攻擊，包括最終Boss的能量彈

而且以上這些道具全部都可以輕易地從小怪身上刷到，或是在商店購入……在道具的幫助下，本作如果純粹想通關幾乎沒有難度可言；就算是全Boss戰無傷這種難度較高的成就，只要多帶幾瓶怪物牛奶+防護罩，一樣能在短時間內解決。

另外，本作不再使用過去的無縫半開放式地圖，轉而擁抱關卡制，還會在地圖上標明隱藏道具剩餘的數量；從好處來說，玩家不需要再為了全收集滿世界亂跑，卻也減少了點親自在大地圖摸索的樂趣；如果只是想達成全收集，不考慮解Boss戰無傷成就，大約10小時左右就能破完一輪。

[h1] 爽快而流暢的遊戲節奏 [/h1]

「簡單」跟「無趣」並沒有因果關係，星之卡比系列同樣以簡單聞名，卻因為有趣的玩法而歷久不衰；本作也是同理。

不曉得是否因為劇情設定上的原因，抑或是玩法考量，本作捨棄了過去Shantae系列最出名的變身系統，取而代之的是種種樸素但實用的「海盜裝備」；其中包括但不限於:能在空中滑翔的海盜帽、賦予衝刺能力的海盜靴，到了遊戲後期還能取得海盜炮，可以達成誇張的四連跳，搭配海盜帽甚至能長期滯空。如果有玩過Ori系列的橫版遊戲，想必都會對Ori後期絲滑的手感印象深刻；而本作在我看來，純論跑圖的流暢度，本作決不在Ori系列之下。另外，雖然隨著遊戲的進行，海盜裝備也一個比一個強勢，但本作的地圖設計以及Boss的弱點都設計的相當有趣，有些地方需要多思考海盜裝備彼此間的搭配才能順利通關。

遊戲第一輪全破之後甚至還能解鎖「海盜模式」，玩家在遊戲一開始就能使用所有海盜道具；雖然遊戲難度降低，但爽快感不減反增，讓我這種技巧不到頂尖的玩家也能享受Speedrun的快感。

[h1] 有趣的人物互動 [/h1]

本作的故事是延續前作Shantae: Risky's Revenge的劇情，但沒玩過前作也不大會影響玩家對於劇情的理解。半精靈Shantae與海盜Risky一向是死對頭，而在本作中，為了對抗來自海盜大師的黑暗力量，兩人不得不放下成見攜手合作。劇情雖然整體而言占比不多，但角色塑造有趣且立體，天真善良的Shantae與老謀深算的Risky形成鮮明的對比，而她們與其他配角的互動也是本作的一大亮點。

除此之外，劇情與關卡也緊密結合，某些地方為了配合劇情，還有相對應的特殊玩法；比如說在Spiderweb Island這一關，Shantae要帶著腿軟的朋友Rottytops逃出生天，在路上完全不能攻擊，而且遇到所有怪物都會即死，反應不夠快的話得靠背版才能通關。又比如在Tan Line Island，Shantae被誤認為皇宮中的公主，宮中的守衛為了防止公主亂跑，而將Shantae囚禁起來，並拿走她的所有道具與海盜裝備；此時玩家必須小心翼翼的迴避守衛的視線，才能順利離開皇宮，頗有潛行遊戲的風味。

最讓我印象深刻的劇情，則是本作的Ture End。本作有兩個結局，而玩家得收集20個Dark Magic才能解鎖真結局；True End不僅氣氛熱血澎湃，甚至還串起了前面的伏筆，令人直呼過癮；這邊就不多劇透了，建議自行體會。

不過有個地方有點可惜:本作沒有中文字幕。雖然網路上有3DM的漢化版，但跟Google翻譯的水準差不多，字體又醜，還不如不用。建議玩家在玩的時候還是邊玩邊查單字，本作的文本量不大，而且文法簡單，就算英文不好也能理解個七八成。

[h1] 總結: [/h1]

本作雖然畫面表現不好，但有趣而爽快的玩法以及輕鬆詼諧的劇情，使本作擁有優秀的遊戲體驗；由於它的難度不高，強烈推薦給想入門2D橫版動作遊戲的新手，對這類遊戲頗有經驗的好手們也不妨一試。

author: {'steamid': '76561198122620436', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 724, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 704, 'last_played': 1709595559}
review:
This is one of the best Indie Games I ever played on my PC. I love Playing Pixel Art Games, but 
probably this is the last game having Shantae Game With Pixel art, And Having Shantae a vest :(

Story: I really love this story (fun fact: that I didn’t play the last 2 Shantae games) it all started in Shantae House when her town was attacked by Ammo Barron, while he’s the only one charge in the town. While with Shantae this is the first time when she was the team up with Risky Boots but probably I don’t know if they become friends in the next Shantae Games (SPOILERS IN VERY DOWN BELLOW)

Gameplay: The Gameplay was awesome I like these Pixel art Platformers Games when you have to go Levels to go, but the only problem to get the Islands are very not so hard you need to complete in the Frostbite Island was a Big Headache I spent all this time by running and checking every Island. The Combat is nice, Fight with your hair. Boss fights are challenging. And Etc

Performance: My 4GB and HD graphics are very helpful to run this game just I didn’t see the Frame rates but it runs so smooth, but sometimes it froze for some reason and I don’t know why but it’s ok to run like that probably need to get new PC soon.

Design: The Design of The Pixel Art is very awesome but for the Characters that are ok just I’m saying you know the clothes they wear, I know it’s rated, T.

Development: These Guys at WayForward did a really Awesome Job Especially with Matt Bozon Co-Creator of Shantae, but It took like 2 years to finish the game, Maybe I don’t know.

11/10 Shantae is the best Gal of Indie Games

review: My favorite of the Shantae series, while removing the transformation mechanic the pirate moves you get are a blast to use. In this game you get various moves that you use on the fly which is breath of fresh air compared to the others games were you have to perform a dance whenever you want to transform. Combine this with the series usual charm and lovable cast this is a great starting point.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025263977', 'num_games_owned': 567, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 812, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 812, 'last_played': 1597961249}
review:
9 / 10. Polished

The third iteration from the Shantae francize really goes out of it's way in regards to gameplay quality. The mechanics are very polished, feel very smooth so the whole experience is quite enjoyable.

All of the classic genie powers were replaced with pirate items and that works for the best because you don't have to constantly sit back and change forms every time. It's just on smooth sail.

The Metroidvania part is still there although the main gameplay is pretty linear. Sometimes you may get stuck because the game isn't that clear regarding where should you backtrack to.

The difficulty is overall ok. The last section of the game goes all out hard on the player. The game offers a lot of challenges so if you're up to it, you should try to go for 100%. I would also suggest going leisurely on your first run. Some of those no hit bosses may take some toll on your nerves. There's also one that doesn't have a savepoint near.

Visuals are ok. Those skimpy outfits are quite well drawn. Not much improvement here from what I can remember.

The music is great, engaging and in tune with the actual environment.

Best Shantae game in the series so far. Very close to a 10 in my book if it weren't for the difficulty and the general confusion regarding the last 3 isles. Will surely go on and play the rest of it's sequels.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117506947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 975, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 948, 'last_played': 1597914669}
review:
W grze został poprawiony prawie każdy aspekt z poprzedniej części gry, w tym tę męczące. Zamiast jednej ogromnej mapy zwiedzamy kilka wysp, które jednak zostały lepiej zaprojektowane, Każda  jest inna i na każdej zdobywamy jakiś nowy element wyposażenia, który urozmaica rozgrywkę i zachęca do powrotu na poprzednie obszary. Dodane zostały nowe elementy rozgrywki takie jak np ucieczka czy skradanie w ściśle określonych obszarach fabularnych co jest miłą odmianą od samej walki. Bardzo fajnym elementem jest to, że znowu zaczynamy w mieście, znanym z poprzedniej części w którym można spotkać stare postacie. Humor  z poprzednich części został udanie tu przeniesiony. Gra podobnie jak poprzednia część nie jest zbyt trudna chociaż niektóre sekwencje mogą dać w kość. Jeżeli ktoś szuka nie za trudnej, przyjemnej dla oka gry dla odprężenia to ta jest idealna :)

Największym minusem gry jest niska rozdzielczość, która jest wynikiem portu gry. Przez co musiałem grać w oknie bo nie mogłem znieść pikseliorzy na pełnym ekranie :(

author: {'steamid': '76561198124362881', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1248, 'last_played': 1597650166}
review: Fun and cute genie game.  Pacing is great, humor is great, magic is replaced by pirate weapons which are attacks or movement options built right onto Shantae, rather than having to stop and do a dance for a few seconds.  Getting 100% completion + achievements was fun, and doing the bosses with no damage was very challenging specifically for 2 bosses in this game.  Definitely 100% this, but only get all the achievements if you're up for a challenge.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086139495', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 731, 'last_played': 1597150759}
review:
キャラは可愛いですし、エロいです。
ドット絵もかなり作り込まれており、動かしているだけで楽しいです。
（ドット絵のシャンティの白目部分が青色なのは違和感はありますが）
ではゲーム部分はどうかというと、強烈な難易度です。
メトロイドヴァニアと銘打たれていますが、それは途中までで、
最終面は、空中を滞空、もしくは細いトゲトゲ通路をダッシュしながら進む、
セレステ系の死に覚えゲームに変わります。
トゲに当たれば一撃死、下に落ちればやり直し。
セーブ地点はないのでクリアするまで一旦休む事もできません。
その手のゲームが問題ないと思う方は、面白いと思うでしょうが、
こういう系統が苦手なものとしては、ただストレスが溜まるだけで、クリアを断念せざるを得ませんでした。
褒めている方には申し訳ありませんが、私には合わないゲームでした。

author: {'steamid': '76561198106380367', 'num_games_owned': 475, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1137, 'last_played': 1595795760}
review:
[h2]Listen carefully, runt. You walked the walk and you talked the talk. Heh, you even dressed the part. But in the end, you're no seafaring cutthroat. Far from it. You can't pretend to be something you're not. And... Neither can I. So long.[/h2] 

[h1][i]~~Risky Boots[/i][/h1] 

[h2]🎮Gameplay🎮[/h2]

[i]Shantae and the Pirate's Curse[/i] plays much like a typical platformer, with an emphasis on wacky enemies. The game's difficulty is rather fair and offers a great time overall, with little in the way of consequences for mistakes. The controls are responsive and in turn, the combat is quite fun and platforming feels very natural.

[i]Shantae[/i] has access to many items, some for combat and others for healing, which can be purchased and obtained from enemies after defeating them. As you progress, you find weapons for combat, such as [i]Risky's[/i] pistol, as well as items that are used for progression and platforming, such as a pirate hat. [i]Shantae[/i] uses her arsenal in very funny, unique ways, against very comical and inspired enemies. The game encourages you to backtrack as you progress, as you can collect heart squids for health upgrades and dark energy for the story.

[h3]Combat[/h3]

[i]Shantae[/i] is initially equipped with only her hair, used as a forward attack in a poking fashion. Throughout the game, you find more weapons and special items to enhance your combat and exploration capabilities, adding more ways to approach a combat situation. Weapons have great balancing as well, with [i]Shantae's[/i] hair being her most basic attack, but also limited to close-range combat, while the pistol is the safer option, although weaker.

[h3]Enemies[/h3]

Almost every enemy encountered has a gimmick of sorts, whether it be for fun, purely a spoof of another game enemy, or something that makes battling them head-on more challenging. Enemies respawn often, which keeps up a constant flow of challenge, but can also get in the way when exploring an area that you've been through multiple times.

[h3]Game Mechanics[/h3]

[i]Shantae[/i] can learn special attacks, as well as unlock weapons and upgrades through story progression.


https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2179777070

How Shantae uses Risky's cannon.


Some of the upgrades you can purchase from the merchant, I found to be useless, simply because I could just use [i]Shantae’s[/i] hair attack and upgrade that. [i]Shantae[/i] can use a kick, for instance, that does more damage than her hair, but its execution is far slower. I found myself just using her hair attack and occasionally [i]Risky's[/i] pistol.

[i]Shantae[/i] has access to items like Monster Milk, which makes her do more damage and as a result, simplifies boss fights a little. You can obtain food to heal yourself, as well as potions. The game even offers auto-potions that are used upon death and essentially revive [i]Shantae[/i]. You can carry 9 of each item, so you'll very rarely be struggling with health.

[h2]🎥Graphics and Audio🎥[/h2]

[i]Shantae and the Pirate's Curse[/i] is presented in a 2D style with all entities presented as sprites, with a background layer for atmosphere. The game does a very nice job of presenting each area, such as a zombie ridden island, in a grim but also chipper way. The game overall is presented in a cartoon like fashion, with pixels and vibrant colors, clearly drawing inspiration from older platforming titles. The game is never shy when it comes to blatant displays of fanservice either.


https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2179777202


The game’s animations are very smooth and barely ever have any out of place frames. Any movements from an entity, whether it be enemy, random NPC or even [i]Shantae's[/i] idle animations, seamlessly transition frame to frame.

Every sound effect and piece of music in this game is designed to fit in a 2D title perfectly. Sound effects are clear and crisp, with a small touch of cartoon elements. Character voices rarely come up, but are also clear and funny when they do. The game's music is pretty catchy and never gets tiring. I always found myself smiling while playing this game, as it's cute and funny in various ways, especially with the music and ambiance. The soundtrack is quite varied and fits each island well. Here's a song I like quite a bit:


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IOp6SPS4HxA


The soundtrack was composed by Jake Kaufman. Jake had his hand in the creation of a few other [i]Shantae[/i] soundtracks, as well as other well-known game soundtracks, such as [i]Shovel Knight’s[/i].

[h2]📖Story📖[/h2]

This is the story of [i]Shantae[/i] and her battle against [i]The Pirate Master[/i], specifically, her battle against many monsters and obstacles in an attempt to prevent [i]The Pirate Master’s[/i] revival. [i]Shantae[/i] and [i]Risky Boots[/i] are on a quest, spanning across several Islands, to collect maps to reveal the next destination in their quest to find the burial ground of [i]The Pirate Master[/i] and to collect dark energy along the way. The energy is the key to [i]The Pirate Master’s[/i] revival, so collecting it halts the process.

[i]Shantae[/i] meets quite a few familiar faces. The character development in this game alone is fantastic, even [i]Risky Boots[/i] changes more than I had originally expected. [i]Shantae[/i] is the kind of protagonist that has such a way of being pleasant and nice that it rubs off on everyone she interacts with.

[h3]World[/h3]

[i]Shantae[/i] and [i]Risky Boots[/i] traverse many different islands, with each one being a game stage, so to speak. Each area has its own set of challenges, enemies and dark energy to collect. Every island has a different theme to it, such as a rainy and dark, zombie ridden island for instance, as well as hidden areas you can access with the appropriate weapons and upgrades.

[h2]💻Performance💻[/h2]

The game performed more than reasonably for me, as it is a 2D platformer and is very well optimized for PC. I played on the highest settings, getting a stable frame rate of 60 with no drops at all. The game only allows up to 1920x1080 resolution and caps at 60fps, but even so, the game looks fantastic and runs beautifully with no drops in performance across the board. I had a crash at the end of the game after I defeated the last boss and read the final texts, but progress was still saved when I started back up, so no real damage done.

[h3]My Specs:[/h3]

[list]

[*]CPU - Intel Core i7-8700k

[*]GPU - GTX 1080 TI Aorus 11GB GDDR5X 1594 MHz

[*]Ram - 4 x G.Skill Tridentz RGB 8 GB 288-Pin DDR4

[*]Motherboard - Asus ROG Maximus X Hero

[*]Hard Drive – Toshiba HDWE150 5 TB

[/list]

[h2]😀Final Thoughts😀[/h2]

I had a wonderful time with this game. I wish I had played the older games in the franchise before picking this up, but the game is still very fun and very enjoyable regardless. It has many funny moments and a little fanservice for good measure, so if that's your thing, you have that to look forward to as well.

This game was everything I hoped for and more. I never had issues with controls, nor issues understanding how to play. It’s a simple, fun and very solid platforming game, with great music and graphics pleasant to the eye, with a pretty neat story to boot. Enemies were always fun to fight, except a handful of times when I just wanted to get something done. The bosses, despite being easierwith items, were still great fun. I recommend giving this game a try!

[quote][i]If'n you liked this review, want to see what else I have opinions on, or just want to read more from me, check out my curator, [/i][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/41675313/][b][i]Plebby's Place.[/i][/b] [/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198003742718', 'num_games_owned': 445, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 2114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2114, 'last_played': 1596604618}
review:
I haven't played any of the other Shantae games, so I don't really have a frame of reference for the story or characters; I'm judging this game on comparisons to other platformers.

[i]Shantae and the Pirate's Curse[/i] doesn't have especially difficult platforming -- after all, even an idiot like me can eventually beat it -- but that doesn't mean it isn't worth a look! The character and monster sprites are well-animated and charming, and the portraits are great. The dialogue is average in quality, but it can be funny sometimes. The physics themselves feel more-or-less on point.

One of Shantae's real strengths is the music, my favorite track being "Scorching Dunes". Play the desert level and tell me [b]that[/b] theme won't get stuck in your head for a few days!

There's one major bug that I've experienced: sometimes, when entering a den of evil, the game will just halt, showing you nothing but a black screen. I recommend saving right before you attempt to enter a labyrinth.

If you like platforming, pirates, or anime girls, then you should definitely give this game a try, especially if it's on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991107959', 'num_games_owned': 2472, 'num_reviews': 140, 'playtime_forever': 601, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 547, 'last_played': 1596288485}
review: Shantae and the Pirate's Curse is the best game in the series imo, even in 2020 after the release of The Seven Sirens. From level design to stylish pixel art and amazing soundtrack, it easily surpasses the previous AND new games. The USP is that Shantae has lost her half-genie magic and must collaborate with the nefarious pirate Risky Boots, her nemesis, to save Sequin Land from a curse (obviously). Therefore, she will recover the legendary items of Risky Boots to progress in the adventure. The story is ok-ish but the characters are endearing and their dialogues hilarious. Some challenging parts also reminds me of Celeste (especially the last trials before the final boss, you'll see). The only negative point is the recurrent backtracking during the game. Recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198111345684', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 895, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 840, 'last_played': 1611248031}
review:
Отличный платформер с умеренной сложностью. Куча разнообразных механик, которые открываются по ходу игры, присутствуют тайники и секреты, приятная стилистика как в игре, так и в диалогах, незамысловатый сюжет про спасение мира от очередного зла. 9/10.

P.s. у кого игра идет слишком быстро - ставьте ограничение частоты кадров для игры в панели nvidia или у самого монитора перед запуском игры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064984442', 'num_games_owned': 602, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 828, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 828, 'last_played': 1596178919}
review:
Super fun little game!

Always liked the series from afar, this was my first one, and I'm really happy with it!

If you like stylish, fun forward platformers with enough challenge to be a just a LIIIIITTLE bit annoying, and oh so sweet when you manage to get past the roadblocks, you'll love this!

Side note: I hate walkthroughs or guides on a first playthrough (just personal preference) and considering I only needed to consult a guide for 1 hidden collectible in the game, I'm actually super pleased with that. A lot of platformers with in my experience make collectibles kinda irritating to find, whereas these ones felt nicely placed and well telegraphed enough that you might miss them at first, but when you're hunting for them: you pick up on the clues. I thought that was a nice feature.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055924996', 'num_games_owned': 184, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 639, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 639, 'last_played': 1596147872}
review:
A very solid platformer with particularly good music. The item progression is really fun, by the end of the game you have a super dash and like a million jumps. The start of the game is a little slow by comparison, though. The replay value is also very high, as there are a lot of secrets, multiple endings, and multiple modes. Wayforward has really squeezed all they could out of a pretty small game. There are a few obtuse moments of progression involving running around with quest items and the bosses are generally pretty lame, but its still absolutely worth playing.

6.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198108658021', 'num_games_owned': 528, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 698, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 698, 'last_played': 1595116645}
review: I bought this game knowing next to nothing about the series, and I can't vouch for the rest of the series because I haven't played it. This game, though, is a delightful little platformer with charm and personality. The controls are tight, the game is bright and colorful, the characters are likable, and new abilities and upgrades constantly incentivize you to go back and explore old areas for secrets and collectibles. There's not a lot to say, honestly; it's just good old fashioned fun 2D platforming. Makes me feel like I'm reliving my childhood memories of staying up late with my GBA under the covers. I definitely wouldn't mind checking out other games in the series. If you need a refreshing break from more modern AAA game design, Shantae and the Pirate's Curse is certainly worth looking at.

author: {'steamid': '76561198991507317', 'num_games_owned': 175, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 646, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 614, 'last_played': 1629280297}
review:
"Я ох*рел, просто" - именно так можно описать мои эмоции от прохождения Shantae and the Pirate's Curse.

Лично я, хочу разобрать игру на плюсы и минусы.

Плюсы:
+Саундтрек. Ну тут даже говорить нечего, он шикарен.
+Геймплей. Тут куча разных приемов, оружия, типов монстров, с получением новых способностей, вы открываете новые куски локации. да, они не большие, но интересные.
+Дизайн локаций. Тут у нас и Снежные горы, и густые леса. Нам не особо объясняют, как близко все острова друг к другу, поэтому не буду трогать уж слишком большое разнообразие типов локаций, но если это все близко друг от друга... то у меня есть пару вопросов к климату.
+Секреты. У меня не было такого, что бы я откровенно тупил в поисках, к примеру, сердца, что увеличит макс. ХП. Все понятно, возможно найти без интернета.

Ну а теперь, минусы:
-Сложность. Где-то до четвертой локации мы будем находится в прогулочном режиме, но потом вы встретите ораву врагов, так ты еще их не знаешь, что они там есть, ведь их скрытное состояние СЛИШКОМ скрытное. они просто сливаются с задником. Потом опять прогулка,и... фин. локация... Ну нельзя так. Нам на протяжении игры вообще не давали сложного платформинга, как вдруг. Ну а боссы не сложные.

Лишь один минус у данной игры я нашел, и то он почти незаметный. Ах, да, я не упомянул сюжет. Он простой, больше мне о нем сказать нечего, все диалоги я скипал.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057733306', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1369, 'last_played': 1595126224}
review: This was my very first Shantae game and I loved every second of it. If you like platformers you will enjoy this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031911349', 'num_games_owned': 399, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 833, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 833, 'last_played': 1595131833}
review: Se eu já amei o Risky Revenge, imagina o Piate's Curse então? Pirate's Curse evoluiu bastante. Ele reaproveita alguns visuais do Risky Revenge e cria novos, você percebe que ele é feito pra rodar numa plataforma mais avançada (3DS, Vita) em relação ao Risky Revenge (DSi). Além dos visuais que permanecem bonitos, tem uma trilha sonora muito boa, com alguns temas remixados e diversos temas novos. Os diálogos continuam muito bons e vários personagens novos carismáticos aparecem nesse jogo. A jogabilidade continua muito boa e até mais refinada agora: Shantae utiliza dos equipamentos de sua rival Risky Boots e tudo casa perfeitamente. Não é mais um mapa único como no antecessor e sim vários mapas menores que ainda fazem do jogo um competente Metroidvania. Na prática ele é ainda maior que o antecessor. Mapas bastante variados, com novos inimigos, novos colecionáveis, bosses e também novos personagens. A parte final acentua bastante a curva da dificuldade e pode deixar alguns jogadores frustrados mas eu ainda acho que Pirate's Curse é um jogo maravilhoso, um pacote completo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020326934', 'num_games_owned': 309, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 633, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 633, 'last_played': 1491946271}

review: Es un juegazo!!, la verdad este Shantae es el primero que juego y lo ame, se convirtio en uno de mis metroidvania favoritos. Lo recomiendo %100!!, lo van a disfrutar muchisimo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198050384087', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 322, 'playtime_forever': 647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 647, 'last_played': 1595110069}
review:
Una aventura muy divertida con nuestra amiga Shantae, en un mundo excentrico y con mucho humor. 

Positivo:
+Posiblemente la mejor entrega de la franquicia. Con muchísimas novedades.
+Mas largo que el anterior, unas 7 horas me ha costado terminarlo por completo. 
+Las armas piratas le da una enorme variedad en jugabilidad. 
+Muchos objetos que puedes usar como la leche de monstruo o otras formas de curarte como la comida. 
+Incorporación de algunos nuevos personajes divertidos. 
+Buena historia, que sigue justo después de la anterior entrega. 
+Entornos variopintos y vistosos, y con una banda sonora muy animada y pegadiza. 
+Cantidad ingente de chistes, algunos con doble sentido. 
+Las Ilustraciones de los personajes para los diálogos 

Negativo: 
-Los Jefes son una broma, no son nada difíciles, me los he pasado todos sin sufrir daño para hacerlos mas desafiantes. 
-La traducción al español, aunque no ponga que la tiene si que está, pero es algo chapucera. 
-La dificultad va bien en todo el juego, menos por un fuerte subidón en la mazmorra final, es corta pero muy exigente. 
-Para ser un Metroidvania, es totalmente lineal. A veces te hacen volver para buscar algún objetivo, pero poco más. 

Me ha encantado el juego, de los mejores Metroidvania que he disfrutado.

review: Pixel art is a bit spotty, I don't think a good enough job was done porting it from the 3DS original. Game runs excellently though and in my opinion is one of the best platformers of the last decade. Absolute classic.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087637323', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1086, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1086, 'last_played': 1594433583}
review:
A fun modern platformer! The pixel art graphics lend themselves to the gameplay well, and the story is surprisingly enjoyable with all of the quirky characters (especially if you get the good ending). Zooming through the levels with the powerful items you get later on is super fun.

Some achievements become unobtainable after certain points in the story, so be wary if you decide to go for all of them in a single playthrough. Many of the collectibles are really well-hidden, so consider using a guide ([url=https://jendogameguide.blogspot.com/2014/12/shantae-and-pirates-curse-all.html]like this one[/url]) if you're not the type of person who likes combing through every level floor to ceiling.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029501452', 'num_games_owned': 316, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 736, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 736, 'last_played': 1594433414}
review:
As a metroidvania it's quite linear other than for optional collectables and the difficulty is not comparable with games like Hollow Knight. 
The level design is amazing though and it has a charming sense of humor. If you want a game that you can finish in a few sessions and that's extremely enjoyable without being too hard then absolutely go for this. I've already played the previous one and will play the following ones.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970502988', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 744, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 744, 'last_played': 1594412010}
review: Just plain fun!

author: {'steamid': '76561198071914233', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1594396782}
review:
It's not necessarily bad, just very mediocre with its game design. It also tries to do a little too much stuff. Even stealth made it in here, which I personally hate and don't expect in a metroidvania/platformer at all.

That said, way too much enemy spam which gets pretty annoying combined with how the game gives you not enough info to know what exactly to do and where to go. Both isn't necessarily an issue on their own, but together it starts to get annoying. Either you know where to go and the way can be as hard to traverse as it wants to be, provided it's not getting recycled too much, or you don't and it's more about figuring out, which means traversing areas needs to be smooth. An enemy every 3 steps makes it everything but smooth here.

The dungeons I saw were great. The rest not so much. As such it's hard for me to recommend. You can do worse, but you can also do a lot better than this.

author: {'steamid': '76561199065062900', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 8283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7541, 'last_played': 1616430194}
review: Shantae has been (vaguely) on my radar for years but I've just never been thinking about it when I had the opportunity to try it out, or the inverse. Now I'm mad it's taken me this long. This game is absolutely amazing. I realize game difficulty is subjective but for my money, it's challenging without feeling unfair, the art is gorgeous, the graphics and sprites invoke serious nostalgia, and the music is absolute fire. I'd say 9.5/10 Can't wait to try some of the other games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013146396', 'num_games_owned': 1655, 'num_reviews': 2129, 'playtime_forever': 666, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 665, 'last_played': 1704317650}
review:
Несмотря на то, что WayForward является мусорным издателем, осознанно издающим исключительно второсортные игры, Шанти - явное исключение. Разумеется, потому что семейка разработчиков у руля знала, что делает.

История хорошая, даже с годным юморком! Можно и простить всякую глупость в духе необоснованной помощи Оружейному. Метаюмор от Осьминога тоже вери гуд!

Графически очень приятно, каждый "островок" выглядит стилистически уникальным, интересным. А анимации какие классные! И сколь тщательно их оформляли! На одну только idle у Шанти есть аж три - в зависимости от состояния здоровья. И это не 1-2 кадра, а прям с десяток!
А как основной город изменяется в зависимости от сюжета! Это ведь тоже труд недюжинный!

Сама Шанти, как и абсолютно все героини игры - ну это хентай. Лайтовый, без непристойностей в лоб, но самый настоящий. Рейтинг "6+" вызывает недоумение, но в принципе мб так и есть для неиспорченного взгляда. Но не нашего с вами. (¬ˬ¬)

Отсутствие русского ну пипец как обижает, хотя ZoG как обычно проделали отличную работу на стороне!

Саундтрек вроде яркий... Но из всех треков я запомнил только один. И то благодаря не ему самому, а MowtenDoo:
https://youtu.be/n52MADpXYT8

Геймплейно тоже хорошо - скучать не приходится.
Например, враги не ходят втупую влево-вправо, а имеют разные фазы при получении урона. Кто спрячется, кто подлетит, кто побежит - и т.д.
Новые способности отлично работают на разнообразие игрового процесса. Да ещё и прокачиваться можно! Я даже сделаю вывод, что нужно - есть боссы, дуэль с которыми страшно представить без ништяков...
Ятаган с ударом в пол и уровни с хрупкими блоками повсюду сразу напомнили Duck Tales с NES :D
Игра вроде как метроидвания, но у меня в голове это не укладывается. Для меня это означает один огромный бесшовный мир, а не выбираемые острова. В принципе, не сильно-то отличается от оригинальной идеи, но всё ж это дело принципа)
Невероятно сложных участков уровней нет - самые лютые встречаются при сборе коллектаблсов, но и то это В РАЗЫ приемлимее, чем аналогичный дро4, например, в "Guacamelee"!
Справедливые концовки! Суть получения каждой никаких вопросов не вызывает. А когда в полноценном финале босс кое-что делает с Шанти до финальной фазы, так это ваще вызвало отвал челюсти!

Мужики-сохранения - плохое решение, как по мне. Тупая трата времени. Почему не сделать условную кнопку на полу с требованием постоять 2 секунды? Не хочешь - не сохраняйся, не вставай или перепрыгни. А сколько времени бы сэкономило. 
Да и вообще, не особо-то удобно они раскиданы. Хоть бы автоматически сохраняться на корабле Риски, и то хорошо. Но нет, можно выпендриться или случайно пропустить мужика, а потом от нелепой смерти откатиться минут на 15 назад. Мда.
С одной стороны, тупой я, когда в голове не смог сопоставить свиток каменного заклинания с окаменелой женой. С другой, не могу признать, что вся вина исключительно на мне: ещё тот мунлоджик догадаться в принципе начать диалог с Боло при наличии очков и камня. Или не понимать, почему осьминог не даёт чернила. Или зачем отдавать модуль определённому персонажу, если в ОПИСАНИИ предмета идут рассуждения НЕ ДЕЛАТЬ этого.
Да и вообще [b]крайне не рекомендую забрасывать игру до полного прохождения хотя бы раз[/b]. Иначе можно почувствовать себя тупым, не понимая, почему после монстров-прихвостней остаются облака и не засчитывается статистика. Или, например, что конкретно сейчас мне надо делать - как и в предыдущей части, задания в инвентарь и на карту не записываются, все требуемые действия нужно исключительно запоминать - иначе даже не вспомнишь, у кого из NPC спросить!
Был случай, когда я вообще забыл, кто такой барракуда Джо, а к нему надо идти. Пришлось ЗАГУГЛИТЬ.

Карта тоже не особо помогает. Так, условные ориентиры какие-то - любые POI отмечаются тупо точкой. Даже если там стоит уже открытый сундук...

Камера приучена исключительно к оцентрированию, поэтому на локациях с прыжками вниз сам себе не позавидуешь. Прыжки веры, не иначе.

Условность "черепа означают смертельную пропасть" разработчиками соблюдается не всегда! Ай-яй-яй.

Получение карт с РОЯЛЯ В КУСТАХ в духе случайной встречи с очередным прихвостнем выглядит максимально дёшево и ненарративно.

Почему-то нельзя в инвентаре посмотреть статус коллектаблсов ТЕКУЩЕЙ ЛОКАЦИИ. Надо возвращаться В ЛОДКУ. Не особо проблематичная недоделка, но крайне неприятная.


...но всё это шутки шутками, потому что я даже не рассматривал выбивание ачивок для душевнобольных.
Нетрудно догадаться, что они из себя представляют: "no hit", "<2h", "no upgrades" - прохождения.
Даже финальный тру-босс не кажется страшным бедствием при обычном прохождении без выпендрёжа.
Но как его и осьминога пройти, например, без сбора апгрейдов жизни, я даже представлять не хочу.

Рекомендую всем платформерщикам, для прохождения за один заход (максимум - пару вечеров подряд) и при условии обычного темпа игры.
Как будут обстоять дела у дебилов с неадекватными вышеупомянутыми ачивками - понятия не имею. И знать не хочу.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043902087', 'num_games_owned': 429, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 876, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 842, 'last_played': 1621049512}
review:
Pros:
- Cute graphics
- Great art direction and music 
- Funny humor
- Smooth gameplay for the most part
- Fun and fast phased bossfights
- Fast loading times

Cons:
- Some bossfights take their own time to get started because of textboxes, it's a little bit frustrating when you wanna try the fight once again.
- For the first 90% of the game the story is kinda there... but the last 10% is great.

Conclusion? 
Best game in the series by far. If you are new to Shantae's games, I'd recommend you start with Risky's Revenge or Half-Genie Hero so you can leave "the best for last".

author: {'steamid': '76561198107641892', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 3886, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 888, 'last_played': 1681940634}
review:
Graphiquement superbe, dynamique, drôle, les musiques sont du jus d'excellence. Je jure Shantae devenue waifu officielle en moins d'une demi-heure.

PS : Le mec qui a construit le dernier niveau est un sacré fou -bien cordialement- qui est tombé dans la marmite de Dark Souls étant petit, et qui n'a pas hésité à planquer des objets utiles dans les plus profonds trous du cul du jeu.

Mise à part ce léger détail, le jeu m'a donné envie de jouer aux autres opus. Shantae and the Pirate's Curse en trois mots = Sah quel plaisir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073450446', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 165, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1593559142}
review:
힌트자체가 좀 빈약해서 행동으로 때우는게 좀 많긴합니다. 그리고 숨겨져있는것도 꼼꼼히 뒤져봐야 나오는 수준이라
일러스트 하나만 믿고 사는거면 좀 생각해보시는게 나을듯합니다.
스토리자체는 단순한편이고 하면할수록 아이템이 언락되서 체력을 늘리고싶을땐 같은맵 뺑뺑이 도는경우가 좀 생깁니다. 즉 체력 늘리고싶으면 뱅뱅이 '필수'가 되는 조건이구요.
게임자체는 많이 어렵지않은편이라서 멍 때리고해도 되는편이고,굳이 상점에서 물약 많이 안사도 몬스터들이 아이템을 많이 떨구는편입니다. 아직 2시간밖에 안해서 제대로 된 리뷰는 못하겠는데 숨겨진 길이나 적 혹은 아이템 찾는게 전 왜케 힘든지 모르겠음..

author: {'steamid': '76561198262452338', 'num_games_owned': 1861, 'num_reviews': 210, 'playtime_forever': 803, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 803, 'last_played': 1593276482}
review:
Having finished the whole series I'll agree with the general consensus, [b]Shantae and the Pirate's Curse[/b] is still the best Shantae game, even in 2020. It's also a great starting point if you want to get into the series. The original Gameboy Color game and [url=store.steampowered.com/app/277890]Risky's Revenge[/url] honestly don't hold up that well, and the later HD games are a bit too casualized, while Pirate's Curse hits that sweet spot where it's still decently challenging without being clunky, and the production values aren't bad at all, the pixel art is beautiful.

Gameplay wise, Shantae and the Pirate's Curse is a 2D platformer/metroidvania, largely inspired by classic video game franchises such as Castlevania, Metroid and Zelda. Just like in most metroidvanias there's a mapping system, ability gating, NPC quests and some light RPG mechanics. However the game is hub based instead of having an interconnected world. Shantae attacks by whipping her long hair (basically imitating the Belmonts from Castlevania), and in this particular game she gets access to various pirate tools, e.g. a scimitar for plunging attacks, a large hat for gliding, boots for dashing etc.

This is usually cited as one of the reasons why the gameplay in Pirate's Curse is so much better than in the other Shantae games. In Shantae's other outings she usually relies on the animal transformation gimmick, where you need to stop dead in your tracks, do a dance and you'll be transformed into an animal that has only 1 or 2 abilities which are all very situational. E.g. in [url=store.steampowered.com/app/764300]Half-Genie Hero[/url] when you come across a high wall, you take your time to tranform into the monkey to jump higher, pass the obstacle and then immediately switch back because the monkey form is otherwise useless. But in Pirate's Curse you just use your cannon jump to jump over stuff without ever stopping. It flows so much better.

[h1]Pros:[/h1]
- Gorgerous pixel art, made by Joakim Sandberg (make sure to check out his game, [url=store.steampowered.com/app/393520]Iconoclasts[/url]) among other people.
- Very catchy soundtrack by Jake Kaufman ([url=store.steampowered.com/app/250760]Shovel Knight[/url] etc).
- Genuinely funny writing with some good gags and clever surprises.
- Lots of sexy girls being unapologetic about their sexiness.

[h1]Cons:[/h1]
- Occasional difficulty spikes, particularly the final dungeon which goes full [url=store.steampowered.com/app/40800]Super Meat Boy[/url].
- A bit on the short side, took me only 7 hours to 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561199063639547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 580, 'last_played': 1593386730}
review: fun

author: {'steamid': '76561198257481411', 'num_games_owned': 93, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 659, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 659, 'last_played': 1593333022}
review:
A fun metroidvania style game. I played Risky's Revenge before playing this game and it took what I enjoyed from that one and improved upon it in here. 
The game takes a good amount of time to play though not too long or short.
There is a decent amount of difficulty to the game. It's not hard but some portions can prove to be a challenge which is nice.
The addition of the pirate items makes the game play more unique and keeps the series interesting and different then the previous title.

It's not a perfect game and it's probably not the game for everyone but if you're into platformers or metroidvania games this one is worth giving a shot I had a blast playing through the game and found myself going back for another playthrough after completing it.

review: This is the best game in the series for me. Since I am a weeb (LOL) I really loved the anime artstyle for the characters in this one. This game also had a good ost just like the other Shantae games in the series. If you're into platformers then you should definitely check this series out and especially this game in particular.

author: {'steamid': '76561198255642418', 'num_games_owned': 212, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1306, 'last_played': 1623852029}
review:
游戏很棒
游戏内显示时间大约花费15小时 而steam时间显示我游玩了20小时
我用一个多小时的时间来调整自己的心情 以免对评论过于片面
连续两天几乎不间断的时间通关了此游戏
在这时间段 我能明显的感受到这游戏的闪光点:  
·精致的立绘(这种类型的立绘真的非常非常棒，要比那些所谓二刺螈的立绘高到不知道哪里去) 
·足以吸引人的美工，像素风格非常的棒(乳摇细节非常棒(针对各种姿势 乳摇的状态各有所不同 牛顿流泪)) 
·音乐也很符合阿拉丁动漫(埃及？)那种风格，很好听 
·娱乐性强(平日车枪 对此类型游戏接触不多 从个人观点来看 我还是觉得非常好玩的)
·剧情诙谐幽默 很轻松搞笑(弹药男爵出场就是个笑柄)
·还有女主配音很好听(娇喘和生气)
但是 这游戏玩过一会 就会发现很多缺点:
·靴子冲刺 这个很要命 靠助跑来耍能量冲刺，而有些地方空间的限制，导致要在那小地方来回跑去耍冲刺 而有时候刷出来了但方向不对 拐个方向能量就没了又得重新刷
·闯关关卡 非常的有问题 特别是倒刺类型的关卡 几乎不能与攻略有偏差 一旦操作出错 就会死 特别是到了boss战前几个关卡(中间还不给存档点！)
·后期的怪特别多 还是扎堆的那种 这意味着你几乎不能无伤通关 还有的怪会卡毕经之路故意碰瓷 日常被怪物碰瓷起不来💔(遗魂村简直是噩梦)。
·小关卡长度 就像第二点 特别针对boss战前面那机关 又臭又长 很考虑耐心 一个小关卡能磨死你 等你通了 后面还有另一个恐怖的小关卡等你(而且没有存档点！！！)
·boss是个废物垃圾 没错 血薄 招式单调(命中还挺大的 但嗑药就完事了 而且泡泡能抵消boss一半招式都不用躲) 除了头会飘 一无是处 三条命就是来拖时间的(我打了那么久的小关卡就是为了见这个废物傻笑？？？)
·镇长也是个废物
就这么多吧 最后 女主很骚 女主很骚 女主很骚
Risky美如画 Risky美如画 Risky美如画

author: {'steamid': '76561198889618642', 'num_games_owned': 258, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 3583, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 238, 'last_played': 1643589159}
review:
Me encanta el juego, el problema es que me sale un error en el que cada ve que salgo del juego todo mi progreso hasta cierto punto se borra, hace unos días pedí soporte de steam y de los desarrolladores del juego pero no tuve ninguna respuesta. Así que no recomiendo este juego por la probabilidad de que el mismo error te pase.
Ni siquiera puedo devolverlo porque el error surgió a las tres horas de juego y después de dos horas de jugar no se puede pedir un reembolso. Por lo que mi experiencia con los juegos de momento es una mierda

author: {'steamid': '76561198275427433', 'num_games_owned': 368, 'num_reviews': 209, 'playtime_forever': 2365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1631, 'last_played': 1592660839}
review:
Shantae and the Pirate's Curse is my first game in the series i had fun with it, the humor is something special and the characters are good as well and sometimes funny dialoges:

+ the story is good
+ open world like map (Skuttle Town)
+ shop to buy heal ithems, new moves, more damage for weapons and attacks
+ 5 islands to explore plus Scuttle Town
+ 6 boss fights all are good especially the Pirate Master
+ Soundtrack is really well made especially Spiderweb Island
+ collectiable to find like Heart Squird and Dark Magic
+ if i find 4 Heart Squirds for getting one more heart
+ diffrent ending screens for different play styles
+ 5 nice moves to find in the adventure every island have one like Sword, Pirate Pistol, Canon,  Pirate Head and Shoes

it won't be my last Shantae game because i think the others will be as good as this one at least i hope so!

author: {'steamid': '76561198111489542', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 823, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 823, 'last_played': 1591615012}
review: Отличная игра. В начале казалось всё плохо. Что нет танцев и враги изменили своё поведение. Но чем дальше тем лучшее. Способности поменялись на снарягу. Хилок стало больше и графику подтянули. Эволюция есть, но не такая как между 1 и 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090767825', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 754, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 754, 'last_played': 1591525356}
review:
シャンティシリーズは今作が初回プレイです。
僕と同じように初回プレイの方にも伝わるようにレビューしました！

見た目はすっごくキュートだけど、アクションはかなり本格的なメトロイドヴァニアです。
ストーリー・キャラクターが魅力的で、やり込み要素もあります。

さすがに人気シリーズの3作目だけあって、相当作りこまれているゲームですね。
メトロイドヴァニア好きなら、プレイして損はないと思います。

ポイントを5つにまとめるとこんな感じです。

[olist]
    [*]完成した世界観・キャラクターが魅力！
    [*]見た目以上にやりごたえがある
    [*]武器・アイテム・行ける場所がどんどん増える！
    [*]やり込み要素が満載！
    [*]2時間以内のクリアも目指せる
[/olist]

世界観やストーリーは前作から引き継がれていますが、初めてでも普通に楽しめました！

注意点として、Steam版には日本語がありません。
とはいえ、アクションゲームなので、僕は英語でもそこまで気にならなかったです。

それに、有志の方が[url=http://scrap-cliff.sakuraweb.com/other/shantae_to_JP_top2.html]「Shantae and the Pirate’s Curseの和訳セリフ集」[/url]を公開されています。
僕もこちらのサイトを見ながらプレイしました。

セール中の最安値は、今のところ990円です。（2020年6月7日現在）
これだけの良作を1,000円以下で遊べるなら、買う価値はあるんじゃないかなと思います。

セール価格じゃなくても、十分安いです。
欲しいと思ったときに、即ポチするのも良いと思います。

僕のブログでも、Shantae and the Pirate's Curseのレビューを掲載しています。
もっと詳しく紹介しているので、興味があれば見てもらえると嬉しいです！

[url=https://miraiyotch.com/shantae-and-the-pirates-curse/]【レビュー：シャンティ -海賊の呪い-】人気シリーズ3作目の良作！[/url]

review: Fun metroidvania. Jumping and fighting is ok. Sometimes you are a bit lost about what you have to do. Usually it is something with an item you last unlocked.

author: {'steamid': '76561198163153593', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 731, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 731, 'last_played': 1590691707}
review: This is so far my favorite entry in the Shantae series. The best part about the series in my opinion is how fun all of the dungeons are, and in this game, all of the individual islands feel like dungeons, so that dungeon aspect of it is much more constant and I love it. The movement in this game feels SMOOTH AS FUC and it's incredibly satisfying to add another ability to your arsenal. Final reason why I love this game is that it feels legitimately difficult at times, which is something I never really felt playing Risky's Revenge, so beating things feels infinitely more rewarding.

author: {'steamid': '76561198260847892', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1524, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1511, 'last_played': 1611523569}

Muy recomendado!!!

Love this game. The platforming is great. Its not a heavy story game at all, no shantae game is. But its enough to make you care and its filled with its whimsical humor. This is the most fanservice of the shantae games so if thats a negative in your book, keep that in mind.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054674251', 'num_games_owned': 660, 'num_reviews': 338, 'playtime_forever': 859, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 859, 'last_played': 1589390291}
review:
I don't know what's worse: all the relentless, deliberate gratuitous cartoon tatas, or that this is a boring kid's game.

I bought this game because the first one was half-baked, and this one was supposed to be better. At least the first game had the good grace to be short. 

If you're here looking for a good metroidvania, this is a hard pass. There is a metroidvania map, and three movement abilities (dash, glide, triple jump), but these abilities play little role in the exploration of this world. Scratch that, there is no "world" to explore. There are six extremely linear levels. Each level has one temple. Two of the levels have platforming instadeath mini-games where you HAVE to go slow--there's no grace to any of the platforming puzzles in this game. Almost all of the game action, back-and-forth is item fetch-quests. Pick this up here, take it to that guy there, now you can continue the game. Yawn. 

I guess if you get your rocks off to cartoon T&A, this is the game for you. But if you don't want to feel like a total creep while playing a boring game, I wouldn't recommend paying for this game like I did.  

Half of my playtime is AFK, pausing between save points.

review:
o melhor jogo da série de longe 

a exploração é muito boa, a ost é incrível [spoiler] (o tema da noite do primeiro shantae logo antes da última área é MUITO bom e climático) [/spoiler], todos os personagens são bem vivos e carismáticos (principalmente a risky, uma pena que isso é ignorado no próximo jogo) e os power-ups são os mais divertidos da série, mais do que as transformações na minha opinião

o último chefe é MUITO bom também mesmo usando itens pra rushar ele e o final verdadeiro é muito bonitinho, um jogão que te recompensa por explorar bastante

9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197964454963', 'num_games_owned': 1453, 'num_reviews': 137, 'playtime_forever': 401, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 401, 'last_played': 1587130814}
review:
Honestly really disappointed with this game, especially considering many people say it's the best Shantae.

The combat is overly simple, enemies are always just a nuisance rather than any real challenge, all bosses have 1 phase and the pattern basically just speeds up, secret hunting forces you to dig up an external guide, and some areas are downright miserable to traverse.

It's also really short (5-7 hours probably), which was fine by me because I was ready for it to end, but if you enjoy the game you may find it's over far too soon
