author: {'steamid': '76561198060769335', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 232, 'playtime_forever': 832, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 832, 'last_played': 1514792561}
review: If your looking to play this game I recommend you play risky’s revenge first as this continues off of that storyline. If you have played risky's revenge then this one is fantastic and improves on the mistakes that Risky’s Revenge made. It doesn't use the multiple layer platforming system which is a major plus. The storyline is much more engaging and interesting not to mention the quirky dialog is wonderful. The storyline is incredibly well written and with the new abilities this one is 200% worth your time and money. It feels fresh and still keeps the feeling of a shantae game. Probably the second best game in the series.

author: {'steamid': '76561198138725696', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 1066, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1066, 'last_played': 1468441766}
review:
Tolles Spiel :) 
Vorteile:
- Abwechslungsreiches Kampfsytem
- Individuelle Upgrades der Waffen möglich
- Humorvolle Storyline
- Humaner Schwierigkeitsgrad, fordert einen manchmal schon aber es gibt nichts wo man nach ner zeit nicht weiterkommt.
- Coole Easter Egs ;)
- Abwechslungsreich (wechsel zwischen kämpfe und unterschiedlcihen jump&runs)
Nachteile:
- Wenn man  länger nciht gespielt hat und dann mit einem Spielstand fortfahren will ist es schwierig sich wieder einzufinden, denn das Spiel verlangt (ähnlich wie bei vielen Zelda spielen) dass man einen Überblick über dinge behält die man mal gesehen hat. So muss man nach Erwerb einer Waffe wieder in alte Karten zurück um dort was freizuschalten. Nach 2 monaten pause weiß man einfach nicht mehr wo was war.
- Um keine Upgrade Items etc. zu verpassen muss man jede Karte genau unter die Lupe nehmen. Ist an sich nichts schlimmes aber da man später den Dungeon nicht ein zweites mal durchlaufen will kommt man manchmal nur sher langsam voran.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972126231', 'num_games_owned': 1176, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 922, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1527547236}
review:
3 years later, the game still runs over 60 fps if you play in a high refresh rate monitor. I still have to mess around with the settings to fix this. The game still doesn't have any sort of image filtering and is blurry. We still need 3d party programs to fix this. Things I would expect on a 1994 game, not a 2014 one.

3 years. Get your shit together, wayfoward. You are capable of much, this is unacceptable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198231965792', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 721, 'last_played': 1516465409}

author: {'steamid': '76561197998118312', 'num_games_owned': 2100, 'num_reviews': 388, 'playtime_forever': 610, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 609, 'last_played': 1527272932}
review:
Rating: 8/10
Genre: 2d Action/Platformer

The Good:
+ Good mix of platforming and combat 
+ Level design is well done often encouraging exploration
+ Collecting new items allows you to revisit previous areas and collect new things.  
+ Fun yet easy boss battles 
+ Witty dialogue 

The Average:
+/- A bit on the easy side for this type of game.  Other than the last dungeon, there aren’t a lot of difficult sections. Those looking for a more challenging game will not find it here. 

+/- Sometimes it can be difficult to figure out where to go next 

+/- Some needless backtracking that feels like padding to make the game longer 

Conclusion 
I can see why this game was getting high praise on Steam. This is a great game in the genre that is well designed in all aspects. Although some are saying this game is similar to Metroidvania type games, I found that is not the case at all; this game is broken into multiple levels.

author: {'steamid': '76561198165915226', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1654654716}
review:
Some view this as the best Shantae game, others are more open to debate. SatPC is a metroidvania style game with fantastic pixel art, catchy music and everything you'd probably love about an old-school game of this style, and all the caveats that come with it.

Some of the puzzle solutions are incredibly obtuse, and the blend of high resolution UI elements with pixel art aesthetics isn't the greatest, but the fact that those are the worst slights against this game speaks volumes.

The items are fun to use, the characters are quirky, and if you are part of a certain demographic, they managed to squeeze a lot of jiggle into a very small sprite.

A worthwhile purchase if you're into the metroidvania genre, but it also comes with the caveats of that title.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036808281', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 142, 'playtime_forever': 893, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 878, 'last_played': 1545167877}
review:
A great metroidvania.  Lighthearted and fun, with a steadily climbing challenge in level design.  Shantae herself will feel far more powerful as you gain abilities.  Bosses are unique and surprising but can usually be overpowered with consumable power-ups. Multiple levels to explore filled with interesting characters.

Some levels can be downright difficult.  Sometimes the game isn't clear where you need to go next, and you'll have to backtrack and experiment to find the path.  Set save rooms mean if you die you may lose a big chunk of progress.  Not the longest game at around 10 hours.

I very much enjoyed this game and would recommend it to anyone.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000670323', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 614, 'last_played': 1515963639}
review:
I think the biggest problem I have with this game is too much backtracking. The "Metroidvania" aspect people gush about is basically just getting a new ability then going back to another level to backtrack through it and find a brick that you need to break or something. It's excessive padding to an already fairly short game. It just wasn't that interesting. It was short enough that I was able to grit my teeth and just finish it, but I wouldn't recommend it that much, unless it's really cheap. There are much better 2D "Metroid" style games out there that do progression much better.

Also, the last level of the game is total BS and straight out of something like Super Meat Boy. Good luck with that if you ever play this. It almost made the entire game that much worse. It's literally cancer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000662885', 'num_games_owned': 474, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 612, 'last_played': 1527285055}
review:
[h1] Esta es la mejor entrega de la saga de Shantae. [/h1]
Shantae Half Genie Hero fue como conocí esta serie, posteriormente conseguí la forma de jugar el primero, luego Risky’s Revenge y por último Pirate’s Curse; sin duda me divertí mucho con todos pero este es el mejor.

[b]Lo bueno[/b]
+Como siempre excelente soundtrack
+Divertida y mejor historia que todas las demás entregas
+Excelente variedad de niveles
+Personajes divertidos y con un estupendo diseño de arte
+El cambio de usar transformaciones a objetos piratas le sentó muy bien
+Muy buena jugabilidad

Claro que tampoco es perfecto y sigue conservando algunos de los inconvenientes que siempre han estado presente en la saga:
[b]Lo malo[/b]

-En general es un tanto fácil si no te interesa hacer speedrun o sacar todos los logros
-Duración escasa. A excepción del primero, absolutamente todos los Shantae al terminarlos me dejan con ganas de más :/
-Puede resultar un juego un tanto simple en comparación de otros grandes metroidvanias

Como siempre Wayfoward nos entrega un juego de Shantae de muy buena calidad, tiene un reto intermedio a fácil, aunque con una buena sección que pondrá a prueba tus mejores movimientos. 100% recomendable, este es un metroidvania super disfrutable sin tantas complicaciones.

author: {'steamid': '76561198109882454', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1234, 'last_played': 1626541986}
review:
¿Te gustan las plataformas? 
¿Te gustan los diseños bonitos, bien hechos? 
si, pues entonces compra este juego, no hay mas.
 
Un plataformas con aires clasicos y muchas referencias a sagas de tu infancia (puede), tiene buenos controles que reaccionan a la perfeccion y es un juego precioso. Y las personajes son una delicia visual. 
su punto mas debil es la historia pero se vuelve muy "x" comparado con lo que cada una de sus zonas te ofrece en cuestion de exploracion y de plataformeo, el juego es lineal pero da gusto aventurarse en la zonas y ver las animaciones en pixeles que tiene.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045235510', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 924, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 924, 'last_played': 1483324657}
review: The best Shantae game. Half-Genie is prettier, but this has better gameplay and story. From the level design and movement mechanics to the character writing and plot.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095924054', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 229, 'playtime_forever': 601, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 601, 'last_played': 1515215281}
review: I haven't played every title of shantae adventure so I can't really say if this is something much more astounding or poor. What I do know is the game is pretty simple and this time your provided with a new set of equipment or abilities to progress on your adventure. The game still has the same formula, so if your a fan or haven't ever played one of the shantae title then this might be something to try. The only thing negative thing to say about this title is how they ramped up the platforming difficulty leading to the final boss. The game felt like 30 to 40% until that level where it became 70 to 80%, some games in the past have done this and it still pisses me off.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089396663', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 1793, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 838, 'last_played': 1664506081}
review:
I just plain really liked it.  It could stand to be a bit more challenging, but otherwise it's a joy in every respect.  Even the blatantly chauvinistic character designs never really seem that harmful, because everything is so light-hearted and fun.  Perhaps that is helped by the fact that the female leads in this game don't need to be saved, but do the butt-kicking themselves while the male characters take a backseat!

I could go through this point by point, but suffice it to say I had a really good time playing this game and I'll seek out the other entries in the series for sure.

Seriously, even the end credits are good.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042111325', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 864, 'last_played': 1514954290}
review:
The creators intentionally ruined this extremely easy yet fun game by throwing in a hopelessly difficult final level full of pixel perfect gameplay where every mistake or unlucky moment sends you back to the beginning of whatever overly long section you're at & the most recent save point is in a different level.

I've never played such a hard or infuriating level in any other game ever. Including the Master Extra levels from Super Monkey Ball 2. N+ never got this hard or this infuriating. I've never experienced such a horrible difficulty spike. Not even in a Guitar Hero or Rock Band game.

The skills involved in this level have very little to do with the rest of the game &, even though everyone despises this level, the creators refuse to fix it even though people who loved the game up to this point have uninstalled it & never played it again.

They ruined the game on purpose just because they could &, depending on whether or not it was as bad in the 3DS version, they may have waited until the end to do it in the hopes that people wouldn't be able to refund. I think I'm done with these developers. I never should have given them a second chance.

I can't play this game anymore knowing it leads to a controller smashing final level that I'd only be willing to finish if I had an extremely self destructive personality & enough money to just keep buying controllers. Mario Maker kaizo levels literally designed to be frustrating are not this bad.

Edit: Oh yeah, I forgot an earlier level has an incredibly tedious stealth section just so the creepy devs can have every female character (the main character's underage, by the way) forcibly stripped, forced into outfits so tiny they resemble nudity, & locked in prison cells & the whole thing is played for laughs & fap material. Mostly fap material.

The whole thing happens because the game ignores the fact that some of these characters are supposed to be able to fight. If you get caught, Shantae goes back to her cell without a fight while looking like a child who got caught doing something bad.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991946932', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 1034, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1034, 'last_played': 1484532451}

author: {'steamid': '76561197972384327', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 654, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 654, 'last_played': 1514677740}
review:
Pros: 
Brightly color sprites brings the look of the 3DS game to the PC.
Lots of collectibles to gather, if you like such things
Great deal of humor and inside jokes if you're familiar with the series.(loved the He-Man gag)
Half naked cartoon hotties, again, if you like such
Great if you are looking for a platfomer fix

Cons:
Too often left with no idea on what to do next without a lot of expermentation, or Google it if you like to cheat.
Controls are fast and slippery, making subtle movements tricky, this causes some areas harder than what they should be.
 By the end of the game, I was left with mostly dull exhaustion, making the last level a chore to finish.

I recommend this game, but with a *meh attached

author: {'steamid': '76561197995664342', 'num_games_owned': 546, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 936, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 936, 'last_played': 1514118600}
review:
A nice metroidvania featuring scarcely clothed voluptious women and lots of hair whipping.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1233634323  
Despite being the third installment of the series and having many references to the previous parts, this was an enjoyable experience by itself. For the most part of the game the difficulty is pretty comfortable, however there was a hard and somewhat frustrating sequence at the very end. The plot is too simple (the evil awakes etc.) but the characters are adorable, the humor somewhere between suggestive and childish, and there is a little gameplay variability (i.e. a stealth and a hurdling mission). All in all, not a great game but quite a pleasant weekend adventure.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967777557', 'num_games_owned': 420, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 665, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 665, 'last_played': 1484998369}
review: Solid platforming fun. Very light entertainment but worth it for the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059193133', 'num_games_owned': 170, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 557, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 557, 'last_played': 1513909665}
review:
There are quite a few things I would say are positive about this game. 
Controls are tight and responsive.
Music is catchy. I wouldn't say that I've been humming it to myself yet, but it fits the theme of the game well.
Spite work and character art is good. Art is subjective, but I found the portraits of Shantae that appear while she talks to be nice to look at as well as amusing.
The writing is good, I find it impressive that they've managed to keep up with continuity since their first game. Everything fits together and you get a feel for who the characters are and why they are the way they are. Humor is also well done, as certain parts made me break out laughing. 

If there were one thing that I would critique negatively, it would be some of the level design towards the end. They throw you into these segments where you either get through in one go or die to insta-kill spikes. I don't mind insta-kills when used in moderation, but that's practically all you get towards the end and it's very frustrating. It's not a game breaker, but it's not much fun to fail instantaneously and repeatedly to these traps.

Overall though, I liked the game. Been playing them in reverse order it seems, so I've got high hopes for the next Shantae game I play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019730955', 'num_games_owned': 174, 'num_reviews': 197, 'playtime_forever': 1135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1135, 'last_played': 1514079948}
review:
Me in the beginning of this game:
Whoa this game is good. I'll probably play this until like 3AM.

Aaaaaaaaaand it's 7AM. I'm not even feeling tired.

I just wish the game was a bit less forgiving. In most situations you can just "drink your problems away" - literally - using HP potions or eating food to restore health mid-combat. You can buy them all the time. It makes the game too easy. Powerups that protect you from projectiles or boost your damage (up to 3x) are also insanely strong. Of course, the game would be a bit disappointing or shallow if you play a half-genie yet don't have any powers, I just wish the devs had balanced the game around these powers. 

Music is awesome btw. I wish I could buy the OST.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140648752', 'num_games_owned': 93, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1652844648}

author: {'steamid': '76561198028933708', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 604, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 604, 'last_played': 1496333215}
review:
I got this game in a humble bundle and didn't play it for about a year before I saw it again and thought "well, I've got it. Might as well check it out." I watched a playthrough of Risky's Revenge and liked it, so I installed Pirate's Curse. Let me tell you: Wow. This game was fantastic. It felt like I was playing one of my old NES games, but way better and not crazy difficult. 

This game had the right balance of puzzle solving and combat, and the story was fun as well. With a bit of searching, I was able to find all but one of the cacklebats on my own. The bosses were fun, and Squid Baron is officially my spirit animal now.

If you liked NES games and want one with a modern touch, I highly recommend this and any other Shantae game on Steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198109910668', 'num_games_owned': 324, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 1103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1103, 'last_played': 1512389396}
review:
Shantae那扭动的小蛮腰真骚啊……不对，真可爱啊……不对，又可爱又骚！

虽然补血道具有很多是很温柔啦，但是关卡难度其实还是蛮硬核的，不过还好都比较短，不会卡很久，还有精致的像素画可以欣赏，不会无聊。尤其是抱着僵尸妹的小碎步，敲可爱(>u<)

结局虽然是傻白甜的老套大团圆，但是并不讨厌，一路走来，能看见大家都好就足够了，像是看完一部迪斯尼贺岁片一样，大团圆就好啦！

除开精致的画面和不错的手感，音乐也值得一提。村庄充满异度风情的炒鸡好听的BGM，瞬间把人代入有灯神的国度毫无违和感。唯一可惜的是村民idle的动画竟然和BGM不合拍，Shantae举着神灯扭腰的风骚舞姿和BGM也不合拍，不能忍！

海盗装的Shantae那小蛮腰真骚啊……不对，真可爱啊……不对，又可爱又骚啊！

author: {'steamid': '76561198141264569', 'num_games_owned': 93, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1803, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 913, 'last_played': 1664757033}

author: {'steamid': '76561198074229855', 'num_games_owned': 405, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 561, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 560, 'last_played': 1527198990}
review:
Puh, ich weiß gar nicht wo ich anfangen soll...
Ich hab mir Shantae: Riskys Revenge, Pirates Curse und 1/2 Genie Hero vor kurzem beim Black Friday Sale gekauft und muss sagen das ich richtig begeistert bin!

-Jedes dieser drei Spiele ((Ich nutze einfach mal die Gelegenheit und schreibe eine Review für alle drei Spiele :P )) strotzt nur so vor liebenswerten und niedlichen Charakteren und Humor.
-Der Soundtrack ist durchgehend super! Sowohl Musik als auch Sound im Allgemeinen.
-Der Schwierigkeitsgrad hält sich in Grenzen. Um ehrlich zu sein ist keines der drei Spiele wirklich Bockschwer. Für mich ideal zum gemüdlich durchzocken und Spaß haben.

Kurz gesagt, Die Shantae Reihe hat sich innerhalb von nur wenigen Tagen zu meiner lieblings Jump´n´Run/Plattformer Reihe gemausert.
Wer also etwas sucht zum ruhigen zocken ohne viel in Stressausbrüche zu geraten ist mit Shantae sehr gut beraten!

author: {'steamid': '76561198083892258', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 667, 'last_played': 1614873446}
review:
If you ever played any platforming games on SNES or any Gameboy console you will really love this! It captures the retro feel completely, including some hair tearing sections with no checkpoints (you'll just have to grin and get through it).
The puzzle elements are pretty clever too and forces you to think and experiment!
SANTPC has great music too!
This game is truely nostalgia inducing, thumbs up!

author: {'steamid': '76561198023952465', 'num_games_owned': 289, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 907, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 906, 'last_played': 1595250095}
review:
The community and the general vibe felt more like one of those fanservice games and it felt like the game would not be as good and that it's only popular because of said fanservice.

Do not do the same mistake I did. The game is an absolute masterpiece from start to finish from the beautiful sprite-work to the music to the satisfaction of the attacks. I definitely highly recommend this game to anyone that's a fan of challenging side-scrollers because it's definitely one of the best ones I've played right up there with Shovel Knight.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020260733', 'num_games_owned': 866, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 570, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 569, 'last_played': 1558446545}
review:
Utterly awesome. A huge improvement over [i]Risky's Revenge[/i], and for as great as [i]Half-Genie Hero[/i] is, it's no match to [i]Pirate's Curse[/i]. While Shantae has no genie powers in this game, her arsenal more than enough make up for it, as they're all really fun to use.

Tight controls, great art, amazingly catchy soundtrack, likable cast, hilarious writing, and an all-around satisfying experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010525195', 'num_games_owned': 698, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 894, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 894, 'last_played': 1511019775}
review:
Finished it in 9 hours with 100%, but I enjoyed it.

Pro:
+ You'll get easily aroused
+ Animation and Character design is simply amazing
+ Level design
+ Controlls
+ Music is amazing on some levels
+ Sound
+ Humor

Cons:
- Story: a good story is whats keeping you in the game. I will not joke around, it was mostly the gameplay and the character design that kept me comming back. The Story was funny, but nothing else.
- It's not a game that got me hooked. When I had to go somewhere, i wasn't like "just this one more level".. I just went, and came back later to carry on. But I wasn't rushing or anything, its was just "..meh, might as well"

No body will read this line, but I will write it anyway: 
all-in-all it was a good game. Nice platforming action, and the enjoyment of collecting things, although I must confess that I'm bored of the "before you head on over to this level, find this and that, and talk to this and that". If the story is bad or none existing then I will just look up everything and not backtrack, to find out where I should need to go.

Side note to devs: HOLLOW KNIGHT!!! Now thats how you write a story. It doesn't need to be dark, as even a funny story can be a good story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013442486', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1510824910}
review:
After discovering and falling in love with Hollow Knight, I just thought "Wow, metroidvanias are cool".

However the difference between the two is just too big. I fell in love with HK's detailed world and somewhat hard difficulty, and I wasn't ready for a total change.

I can see the fun in Shantae games with the jokes and simple gameplay, but it really feels like I'm playing a "low budget" game. The part that really got me out straight off is the rigid gameplay, wich I find really awkward for a action-platformer.

In the end buy this if you want to have light hearted fun, buy Hollow Knight if you want a deeper plot and some actual challenge for a lower price.

I have made my choice, but yours is only up to you!

author: {'steamid': '76561198010315744', 'num_games_owned': 1309, 'num_reviews': 725, 'playtime_forever': 703, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 613, 'last_played': 1510708169}

author: {'steamid': '76561198001092707', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 625, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 624, 'last_played': 1518844264}
review: Great game, which takes the Shantae formula from the previous game and makes the movement and combat faster and more fluid. Fantastic pixel art graphics, and once again engaging characters and storyline. HOWEVER, that final level. Never again. There's an insane difficulty spike on the final stage, and it's frankly not very enjoyable. Hope you stocked up on potions, auto potions, and super pike balls. You have to wonder what the devs were thinking here. Overall, lots of fun, builds off the last game in regards to story and plot, and is immensely fun to play! Highly reccommend!

author: {'steamid': '76561198083902302', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 640, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 639, 'last_played': 1514222080}
review:
Just finished this whimsical platformer.  While the game is short, only about ten hours or less, it is worth the buy.  I got it on sale for 20 or 30% off, I forget which.  

This is my first game in the Shantae franchise, and I liked it a lot.  The game is mostly plot driven, with very decent comedy even for good comedy games.  It is only lightly challenging for a casual gamer, though you could probably test yourself with speedruns and achievements.  I found no bugs.  The game has decent comedy plot, though it does rely on eye candy a little too much.  Either way, it's a fairly fun and funny casual game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198274950626', 'num_games_owned': 686, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 723, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 663, 'last_played': 1636115898}

author: {'steamid': '76561198016632416', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 295, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1504746020}

author: {'steamid': '76561198011428147', 'num_games_owned': 170, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 1174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1174, 'last_played': 1509234357}
review:
Its a good blend of platforming and adventure.

The gameplay takes place on different islands, which acts as different "worlds" - a collection of various interconnecting platforming rooms. Worlds are revisitable, and necessarily so for story progression. New areas (previously inaccessible) naturally open up as you learn new abilities. "Metroidvania", in a way.

Music is good, characters are charming, and the level design is TOP NOTCH.

The difficulty is somewhat conerning, however. Some not-so-talented players may find themselves saying "Screw this!" and not finishing the game after you start reaching more reflex-demanding portions of the game. Likewise, with more thought-provoking parts of the progression, where you're stuck not knowing where to go or how to progress. I'll stress this again - this game makes you think! Remember who you spoke to, revisit them, including random travelers, they typically can tell you something vital.


Overall, I really enjoyed it. I like challenging games and this one delivered. I just got two pieces of advice for you:
1) Remember who you speak to. You'll get lost/stuck otherwise.
2) Don't waste your money on that $400 "Mighty Kick" nonsense. Your basic attack will always be better.

author: {'steamid': '76561198411643888', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3544, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1844, 'last_played': 1654363581}

review:

What is it?
You'll just have to play to find out ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198196633890', 'num_games_owned': 546, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 1163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1158, 'last_played': 1614404272}
review:
相较于前作，本作的整体素质提高不少。（当然前作也很优秀，没玩过推荐玩玩）
人物缩小了占屏比，没有前作那种拖屏杀的尴尬
虽然有不少前作的敌人，但大幅改变了系统，不会觉得和前作太像
无法使用魔法（倒是保留了最实用的pike ball，只是变成了消耗品），也不能变身
取而代之的是各种海盗道具，可以滑翔、冲刺、三段跳等。
虽然这些系统似曾相识，比如冲刺就很银河战士，刺刀让人想到唐老鸭2的拐杖。不过现在2D游戏能也很难有什么革命性的创新
主要关卡设计得不错，和这些道具相得益彰
以及里面的剧情、人物都还是挺欢乐的。
缺点嘛
仍然缺乏提示，卡关只能满世界找攻略，偏偏又不好找。好在B站有人发了流程视频，可以参考
部分接任务满世界拿道具这样的剧情展开也挺无聊。
以及有些地方真的恶意满满。
总的来说，仍然是当前复古像素风2D平台动作游戏的优秀作品

author: {'steamid': '76561198299251171', 'num_games_owned': 255, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 1437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1011, 'last_played': 1710017248}
review: 10/10 for boobies

author: {'steamid': '76561198213274559', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 816, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 803, 'last_played': 1654946193}
review:
簡單休閒的良作，粉絲服務水準高(無誤)，看順眼就下手吧。

優點:
1.主角操作流暢，攻擊判定準確。
2.Risky的武器非常實用，與武器相應的解謎也很有趣。
3.整體難度不高，存檔點與道具都非常佛心。
4.沙必死多，主角群跟敵人都性感可愛。
5.高水準的像素動畫。
6.對話內容生動幽默。

缺點:
1.劇情比較分散，收尾稍嫌不連貫且沒力。
2.鍵盤玩家一定需要先自己調整按鍵。

author: {'steamid': '76561198142011295', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 1137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 867, 'last_played': 1494066275}
review: A fun linier platformer with Metroid elements thrown into the mix. Art is nice, gameplay is fluid, powerups synergize well, a little dull in some places. Passible and fun over all though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198281801183', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 762, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 762, 'last_played': 1506402193}
review:
평소 플랫포머 장르를 즐겨하지 않는데도 상당히 재미있게 하고있습니다.

어린시절 해봤던 록맨이나 악마성같은 게임들을 적절하게, 맛깔나게 버무려 놓았네요
그런데 이런 게임을 단순하게 배낀 아류작이라는 생각은 안들정도로 잘 맏들었습니다

아이템 사용을 단축키로 하게 해놓아서 게임 템포가 빠르고 긴장감이 있는데 이것땜에 액션성이 찰지다고 느끼는거 같네요

그리고 제일 중요한 장점은..... 샨테가 귀엽다!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198027665386', 'num_games_owned': 621, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 786, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 786, 'last_played': 1506029936}
review:
Jouer à un Shantae, c'est entrer dans le pays des bimbos cartoonisées. C'est passer plus de temps à mater le design olé olé de tous les personnages féminins plutôt que de lire leurs dialogues. Et pour un premier contact avec la série de la gentille génie (devenu humaine suite à la perte de ses pouvoirs dans cet épisode), j'ai été surpris de voir que même les femmes plus âgées sont bien entretenues ! Merci chers devs de prendre soin de vos milfs !

Je dois avouer qu'au départ le gameplay ne me plaisait pas du tout. À part sauter et fouetter les ennemis avec sa chevelure en tortillant son petit cul, on ne pouvait rien faire d'autres. Mais metroidvania oblige, quelques améliorations de son personnage son éparpillées sur notre chemin au cours de l'aventure et rendront le gameplay très agréable et maniable. Et bon point pour toi Shantae, c'est que ce large panel qui étoffera les possibilités se maîtrisera aisément parce que le jeu est assez ben foutu pour nous apprendre à utiliser l'amélioration acquise, puis de la combiner avec une ancienne, etc.

Je dois évidemment parler de l'humour du jeu. Sûrement ce qui m'a vraiment fait apprécier le titre. Tous les personnages sont bêtes et font de l'auto dérision. Ils n'hésitent pas à dire des conneries, vous prendre pour un con et à raconter leur vie alors qu'on s'en fout royalement. J'ai par exemple beaucoup aimé le Squid Baron lorsqu'il parle de ses vacances de rêve et qu'il veut voir des jolies filles en petite tenue sur la plage du désert. Il y a quand même quelques moments sérieux bien sûr, sinon la quête pour anéantir le méchant pirate ne rimera à rien. Je trouve quand même dommage que les personnages ne sont pas du tout attachant, ils sont drôles, en forme (pour les nanas ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)) et... c'est tout.

Chose assez relou par contre même si tout est coloré et que l'aventure nous emmène sur des îles fort variées avec ennemis et ambiance différente, c'est qu'au fil de l'histoire il faudra trouver des objets de quête pour avancer. Des quêtes plutôt simple ma foi, mais la où c'est chiant c'est qu'il faut souvent (pour ne pas dire tout le temps) se taper plein d'aller retour d'une île à l'autre et croyez moi que c'est pénible surtout quand on doit chercher dans tous les coins et revenir 20 fois sur ses pas quand on loupe quelque chose. Heureusement qu'il existe un objet pour revenir instantanément au début de l'île, mais je pensais jamais à l'acheter et je perdais inutilement mon temps. Ce n'est pas vraiment à classer dans les "points négatifs" du jeu, mais ça reste à souligner.

J'ai vu que beaucoup de gens parlaient de la facilité. Oui c'est facile quand on joue juste comme ça sans se prendre la tête. Moi qui veut les succès sur steam, j'ai galéré à quelques passages lorsqu'il faut par exemple battre tous les boss sans se faire toucher ou même terminer le jeu en speedrun. De la re-jouabilité il y en a, mais il faut aimer persévérer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198168734636', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 683, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 544, 'last_played': 1506896862}
review:
11/10 soundtrack ( when scuttle town was under construction why did the music change D: ) Dialogue in this game is actually hilarious at times and the pace of the game is fairly consistent. The gameplay was surprisingly more interactive then in riskys revenge. Going from transformations to pirate weapons in my opinion made the game feel more enjoyable. With transformations you have to sit there and wait to transform into a very specific creature to do a very specific job, and then u revert back to ur human form when the deed is done. With the pirate weapons you can do more then just hang on walls or swim in the sea. You have ur boots to speedrun through the level. Pistol for long range attacks. Hat for gliding across areas or avoiding grounded enemies. (Scimitar wasn't too interactive imo since I only used it to break blocks and that's it.) The difference between pirate weapons and transformations is that you are always using pirate weapons on the fly all the time, where as transformations were just there to get past a certain obstacle and that's it. You could even combo ur weapons like speeding up with the boots and using that momentum to fly across the level with ur hat while keeping ur self in the air by boosting urself with the cannon. With all this in mind it made the gameplay very creative and fun to mess around with. 

There r times when the game makes huge jumps in difficulty without warning. For example, Tan Line Island was meh in difficulty only being the third island but the one right after is insane compared to Tan Line. 

Overall I gave the game a 8.5/10 and would recommend this game to anyone looking to play a metroidvania style game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198114344279', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1055, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1055, 'last_played': 1504857124}
review:
ก็สนุกครับ สนุกแบบ.. คือเล่นสนุก เหมือนกับตอนที่เราเล่นเกมตอนเด็กๆ
เรียบง่าย, enjoy ไปกับ gameplay, ไม่ได้ต้องการอะไรอลังการแบบเกม AAA

gameplay เกมเป็นแนว platformer แบบไม่ยาก เล่นได้เรื่อยๆ เพลินๆ
แบบ.. ผมว่ามันก็สนุกดี ไม่มีเหตุผลอะ องค์ประกอบต่างๆมันลงตัว
มันง่ายตรงที่ตัวละครเราค่อนข้าง OP หลังจากค่อยๆเก็บของ และอัพเกรด
แล้วยังมี item ช่วย เติมเลือดเยอะมาก ดรอปเยอะด้วย
และสามารถใช้ทริค คือ พอจุดเซฟ ก็กดเซฟ แล้วโหลดทันที เลือดก็จะเต็มทันที
ท่าโจมตีตัวละครก็ไม่วุ่นวาย แค่หลบ แล้วตีธรรมดา ก็โอเคแล้ว
(บางคนอาจจะไม่ชอบ ที่เกมมันน้อยเกินไป ไม่มีอะไร แต่ส่วนตัว เราชอบอะไรน้อยๆ ไม่เยอะวุ่นวาย)
.
มีความเป็น metroidvania หน่อยๆ คือ พอได้อุปกรณ์ใหม่ๆมา ก็จะสามารถย้อนกลับไปเก็บของ ตามที่เก่าๆได้
แต่เกมนี้(ภาคนี้) ออกแบบฉากมา แยกเป็นเกาะๆ แยกออกจากกัน ไม่ได้เป็น map ใหญ่ map เดียวเหมือน metroidvania ทั่วไป
ชอนเต้ภาคอื่นๆจะเป็น การเต้น เพื่อเปลี่ยนร่าง แต่ภาคนี้ ความสามารถเรา จะมาจากการใช้อุปกรณ์โจรสลัด ของ Risky แทน

การควบคุม (เราเล่นด้วย controller) ก็ดี, ตัวละครเคลื่อนไหวได้ลื่นไหลดี รวดเร็ว ตอบสนองดี
ใช้ปุ่มไม่เยอะมาก ควบคุมง่าย

ตีมเกม เป็นแนวสดใส มีมุกตลก, เนื้อเรื่องก็พอไปได้เรื่อยๆ ไม่ได้เข้มข้น ถือว่ากลางๆละกัน
ให้มันพอดูมีเหตุผล ที่เราต้องไปตามเกาะต่างๆ

art ตัวละครสวยดี

เพลงประกอบก็ใช้ได้ ค่อนข้างดี
แต่เป็นธรรมเนียมของ series นี้ ที่ตัวละคร ไม่มีการพากย์เสียง (จริงๆ มีนิดๆ ไม่ได้ full voice)

ข้อเสียที่นึกออก คือ การ design ฉาก ของภาคนี้ มีหนามแบบ Rockman เยอะมาก 
คือโดนทีเดียวตาย ต้องพยายามผ่านฉากหนามนั้น ใหม่
(ตอนชอนเต้ตายจากหนาม ก็มีมุก ตัวแตกเป็นเม็ดๆ แบบ Rockman ด้วย)
ซึ่งส่วนตัว เราไม่ชอบเกมแนวนั้นเลย
[spoiler]โดยเฉพาะฉากสุดท้าย จะไปเจอ final boss 
ออกแบบมา คือ ไม่มีศัตรูเลย ต้องหลบหนามอย่างเดียว ยาวมากกกกกกกกกกกก
คือ เราก็เล่นผ่านได้นะ แต่ไม่ค่อยประทับใจเท่าไหร่
[/spoiler] 

อีกอย่างคือ เกม series นี้ timeline มันจะต่อกันไปเรื่อยๆ
ไม่จำเป็นต้องเล่นภาคเก่าก็ได้ แต่จะดีกว่า ถ้าเล่นภาคก่อนหน้ามาก่อน จะได้อินกับตัวละคร เนื้อเรื่อง มากขึ้น

สรุป ใครชอบเกมแนว 2D platformer +metroidvania, เกมนี้ก็ถือเป็นอีกเกมที่ดี น่าลองเล่น

อ้อ เราทำช่อง YouTube แล้วเล่นเกมนี้ไว้ด้วย ถ้าสนใจก็ไปดูกันได้ : [url=https://youtu.be/XkwI-qHhjdg?list=PLkLYyaCAXlGHzokINilO_CTHrLf1mks0m] CLICK ME !!! [/url] 
เกมนี้เล่นตอนฝึกทำช่องแรกๆ คุณภาพการพากย์อาจจะแย่หน่อย แต่ถ้าจะดูเอา gameplay ก็ถือว่าโอเค

author: {'steamid': '76561198098353911', 'num_games_owned': 9971, 'num_reviews': 895, 'playtime_forever': 1922, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1882, 'last_played': 1522071766}
review:
刚接触这游戏的时候，还不知道有前作，但是，这游戏超好玩的，好嚒。
我就喜欢这种横版过关类的游戏，有种怀旧的感觉，而且画面也不错，最最最印象深刻的就是音乐，非常好听的。游戏性很好，难度适中，全成就当中的全收集，全部高难度BOSS无伤，二周目等速通可能要花点时间，不过也乐在其中。
每个BOSS都很有特色，掌握了套路很容易达到无伤。全程游戏二周目海盗难度下来，乐滋滋。
Shantae 新作Half-Genie Hero也出了，但是个人感觉难度比这作要简单太多。但是画面更好，音乐也有这作的影子，主角也多了很多变身的能力，猴子，大象，蝙蝠，螃蟹等都很萌，为游戏增添了不少乐趣，强烈推荐。



[spoiler] 别看啦，快去下载玩吧  :)  [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198097464980', 'num_games_owned': 763, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 627, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 625, 'last_played': 1527518377}
review:
只推荐给喜欢简单休闲的平台动作游戏玩家。

优点的话：人设、音乐，还有人物的各种能力及与其搭配的关卡设计
但是总的来说关卡设计并没有比较出色的地方。
缺点：
- 怪物感觉比较单一，不过毕竟不是以打怪为主的游戏
-- 手柄没法反向跑冲刺，但是键盘没这个问题
-- BOSS的招式太少了。。
- 剧情？妹子比剧情更吸引我。

author: {'steamid': '76561198072068645', 'num_games_owned': 1449, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1566, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1551, 'last_played': 1679595553}
review:
17/20 - Muy bien definido en comparacion con sus predecesores

OST: 5/5 
(La musica tiene una armonia increible con los mapas jugables que te envuelve y atrapa tanto así para quedarte en cierta parte para seguir jugando mientras escuchas la misma tonada)

Gameplay / Jugabilidad: 4/5 
(La esencia de este juego es completar cada puzzle que se te ponga en frente con la herramientas que te suministren, pero al completarlo solamente te quedan hacer los Archivement/Logros como reto, ya que no te da una forma de seguir rejugando el juego al completarlo por primera vez con todos sus requerimientos originales.)

Historia: 3/5
(Difiere demasiado con la historia original, como si el primer juego de la saga nunca hubiese tomado lugar.)

Rendimiento: 5/5
(Es un juego 2D, No hay mas que decir, posiblemente hasta los Chipsets lo pueden mover sin problema alguno.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198051264306', 'num_games_owned': 226, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 616, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 616, 'last_played': 1504862945}
review: Although I've know about Shantae since it's debut on the GBC, I've never given it much thought.  As an avid fan of Metroidvania/2D platformers, I've seen this game recommended quite a few times and decided to give it a shot.  I didn't know what to expect, so I was pleasantly surpised.  The good: Great music, great art style/animations/visuals, tight controls, funny, colorful and more importantly, very fun. Flaws: I can't honeslty say anything bothered me, but if I had to, I wish the game was a little bit longer and little bit more challenging.  WayForward has made me a fan, so I think I'll grab the GBC game and start from there.  If you're a fan of Metroidvanias/platformers like me, give this one a go, I can't recommend it enough.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997448302', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 472, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 472, 'last_played': 1504567558}
review:
[h1]Shantae and the Pirate’s Curse – Short Review[/h1]

It seems the Shantae series have been going for quite a while. Actually, this series began on the Gameboy Color but I have only heard of it recently. Well, not that recently as in the Nintendo DS days I heard about a game called Shantae being released on the DSi Shop but as I didn’t own a Nintendo DS DSi, only the Lite model I kind of forgot about it.
A few years forward and many more games of this franchise have been released on pretty much all platforms and after seeing some charming graphics and pretty artwork I, being a sucker for a good 2D platformer, decided to give it a go.

Honestly, I did hear this game was good but I couldn’t possibly imagine it would be this good! I played Shantae and the Pirate’s Curse on PC and I have to straight out say it, this is certainly one of the best, if not the best 2D platform game I have played on PC.

You start your adventure just chilling in your home when your arch nemesis knocks on your door and you are set for a new adventure. While Shantae and the Pirate’s Curse is a 2D sidescroller it is more than it seems at first glance. At start you have Scuttle Town which is the main hub part of the game. There is where you can talk to most NPCs, always with great and funny dialogue. Here also you can buy items and upgrades but you may come back to the town for more than that as the game has different but welcome way to make you progress. Many times you’ll have to deliver items to NPC to help them with their troubles which in turn helps you move forward on your adventure. The best thing about it is that it is very organic and refreshing.

Aside from the main town you have islands you get to explore, find secrets but also in most of them there are dungeons which come in varied forms and each with new mechanics so the game always feels fresh. It is also good because as you gain new abilities they aren’t just used in the current dungeon and then forgotten, quite the contrary, they are all required in the subsequent dungeons and many are important to help you find secretes scattered around the islands.

The combat is not on the hard side but it is always fun. The platforming on the other hand, there are some pretty easy parts but when the game decides it’s going to be hard, it’s lovely. Such a good challenge but never frustrating as it is pretty lenient with checkpoints.

Gameplay wise, this game is a blast from beginning to end. I do love some Metroidvania games but on top of the already great aspects of the genre there is also some great characters and dialogue.

Another things worth mentioning is the graphics which look lovely. The game has a charming pixelated graphics but always full of color and details. Also, we have the music which is fantastic. The music is in fact so good I’ve been humming the theme for the town for a while now.

Overall this game is a must play. I can’t recommend it enough. If you are in any way intrigued by this game, be it the graphics, the 2D gameplay or the adventure aspects, please give this game a go because I doubt you will regret it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077083272', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 270, 'playtime_forever': 912, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 912, 'last_played': 1504277369}
review: La digne suite de Shantae: Risky's Revenge - Director's Cut. On incarne de nouveau Shantae dans un jeu de plateforme-aventure qui plaira aux nostalgiques des années 90 pour les graphismes et la bande son. De nombreux objets sont à débloquer pour pouvoir progresser dans sa quête, compensant la perte des pouvoirs magiques de l'héroine à la fin du premier jeu. La ville principale est la même que dans le premier et la quasi-totalité des boss (mention spéciale à squid baron) et des thèmes a été reprise également. Le jeu propose une bonne durée de vie d'autant que le niveau de difficulté mettra vos nerfs à rude épreuve surtout vers la fin.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025272394', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 602, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 602, 'last_played': 1504112017}
review:
¿Lo recomiendo?
Sí

¿Es perfecto?
NOOO

Shantae es un plataformas de exploración vistoso y entretenido, pero... pero... PEEEEERO, hay un par de zonas donde el ritmo de juego se rompe completamente, obligandote ir literalmente pasito a pasito si no quieres recibir daño, momentos (muy excasos pero los tiene) en que no sabrás a donde has de dirigirte, una mecánica de combate pobre y con cuadros de daño ligeramente injustos contra según que enemigos, y una historia prescindible.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970415779', 'num_games_owned': 432, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 557, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 557, 'last_played': 1503828997}
review: Super good metroid-vania style gameplay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060733145', 'num_games_owned': 380, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 907, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 678, 'last_played': 1503838558}
review:
Shantae буквально вернула меня в детство. В ту 16-битную эпоху когда трава была зеленее, боссы мясистей, а игры были играми, а не набором контента. Мне буквально нечего придъявить игре - она идеальна(в своем жанре). Запоминающиеся милые персонажи, классная музыка, не напряжный геймплей(хотя бывает не легко) и юмор, делают эту игру настоящей жемчужиной в жанре метроид. Заслуженные 10 мясочупсов из 10. 
PS Ели игра вас зацепит как и меня, советую попробовать еще Momodora: Reverie Under the Moonlight.

author: {'steamid': '76561198156832922', 'num_games_owned': 283, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 846, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 846, 'last_played': 1503442162}
review:
Génial !
C'est bien la première fois que je me fais un Metroïd-Vania sans m'arrêter.
Les personages sont rigolos, les graphismes très sympas et les musiques entraînantes.
Il faut absoluement le finir à 100% (avec toute la magie noire) afin de voir le boss de fin dans tous ses états et une séquence finale digne de ce nom.

Je me lance dans la suite ... sur Switch.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041285582', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1839, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 748, 'last_played': 1531687207}
review:
An amazing soundtrack that I can't get out of my head even after a few years, which the composer sells for whatever you give him for it.
A great platformer which introduces mechanics along the road, opening new ways for you to reach new areas.
An adorable, well-animated female protagonist who I can't get out of my head as well.
A storyline which has good humour and doesn't take itself (too) seriously.

Yeah, I think it was worth it buying the game more than once.

Just run before it takes over your life as well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012511360', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 494, 'last_played': 1503195674}
review:
A satisfying metroidvania for both casual and hardcore gamers looking for something refreshing. Although the game is a piece of cake in comparison to other metroidvanias due to the amount of consumables the game throws at you, the final boss (the true one) will still pose a good challenge (especially if you're not using consumables). The upgrades you obtain from beating each world build upon each other and every single one of them continues to be useful throughout the game (unlike in Risky's Revenge); Each upgrade feels very responsive to use, activating immediately and allowing the player alot of freedom in approaching different situations. 
As always, Shantae's regular gameplay of beating down enemies with your elastic ponytail is satisfying. I can give this a strong recommendation to anyone who likes the general aesthetic of this game; artstyle or gameplay-wise.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062025694', 'num_games_owned': 302, 'num_reviews': 312, 'playtime_forever': 856, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 856, 'last_played': 1502910924}
review:
Primer Shantae que juego, me pareció un tremendo juego, super divertido, plataformero un poco moderno, diversidad de enemigos, duración de juego bastante decente considerando la historia y sacar todos los items, la jugabilidad está muy bien lograda, junto con los objetos que vamos obteniendo a medida que avanzamos, en resumen un juego muy recomendado ! Y ahora quedé con ganas de jugar los otros shantae.

*Como olvidar mencionar la música del juego, uno de los tantos puntos altos de este, muy divertida y pegajosa !

author: {'steamid': '76561198166245047', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 212, 'playtime_forever': 1652, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1652, 'last_played': 1496615950}
review:
Metroidvania with wonderful graphics and funny dialogs and scenes.

Music is nice and lively. Many scenes have a humour twist and this makes the characters comedy like. Character animation is cute and great.

Shantae hits people with her hair and powers it up buying shampoo. Some items are crazy and original, as a cannon for triple jumping while shooting into the ground. There is also plenty of grabs for recovering life, defending yourself and raising attack damage.

Maps have some secrets. Maybe one point down is that many of these secret areas are needed to advance in the game, making them not-so-secret and more like you-can-now-jump-there. Should have been less linear.

Difficulty is medium like. Boss battles are frenzy but doable. Bosses require you to use the item you get in each dungeon, which is an intelligent choice.

Maybe last dungeon is crazy but it can be done after some (or a lot of) trial and error.

Also, I won't even try to do the no hit while killing bosses achievement. This is madness.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048793527', 'num_games_owned': 1333, 'num_reviews': 222, 'playtime_forever': 1578, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1197, 'last_played': 1486868142}

author: {'steamid': '76561198028116130', 'num_games_owned': 354, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 579, 'last_played': 1487841904}
review:
i have never heard of the shantae series until the one before this. albeit very similar to the previous one in terms of very responsive controls, plays like a classic metroid-vania (though not as hardcore as some) platformer, awesome soundtrack yet basic story. this time they took away shantaes genie powers and gave us power ups in the shape of pirate equipment which helps you do double jumps, sprints, and the like. 

i personally like this game better than the previous one because its way more fast paced than the last and it took me a bit longer to beat too so it doesnt feel a short. 

its affordable as it is for a 10-hour ish game , even more so on sale. if you like platformers/metroid-vania, you will like shantae.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063955609', 'num_games_owned': 2197, 'num_reviews': 216, 'playtime_forever': 873, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 873, 'last_played': 1502633709}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561197970859560', 'num_games_owned': 5618, 'num_reviews': 358, 'playtime_forever': 707, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 707, 'last_played': 1502600777}
review: This was a lot of fun. Tight controls, fun writing. The difficulty was a little 2-speeds: too easy and quite hard, but rarely boring and rarely insurmountable. There's a little unnecessary back-tracking (beyond hunting for the collectable objects), but overall, a fun, balanced platformer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018552297', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1400, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1588206956}

author: {'steamid': '76561198281397522', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1188, 'last_played': 1502510867}
review:
这作对比之前复仇，好太多了，完全是两个层次的游戏。
人物可以升级攻击力，升级攻击频率，有地图，关卡设计合理，重复跑图也不觉得厌烦
手感更是比前作好太多，这作地图系统以及获取的技能，非常像一款恶魔城游戏
下面说细节：
1.冲刺技能在短平台上也能实现，左右不停走，把握好时机就行，用键盘比手柄容易触发，速通使用有奇效
2.人物跳起后海盗帽，之后连跳，最后再海盗帽，可以一路直接跳上最终关平台，速通使用有奇效
3.除了最终BOSS，其他的BOSS无伤成就磕了药，开了铁球硬怼就行了。
4.最终BOSS铁球比较难躲，分别蹲下躲在左手第三个柱子，左手第四个柱子靠左一些即可。
5.刷钱的话金字塔是个好去处。
6.手柄用Y键可以用神灯吸收钱币以及其他物品。
下面是youtube搬运的速通视频
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMjk2MTgxNDYzNg==.html?spm=a2hzp.8244740.0.0

review:
An outstanding game! Nice and colourful visuals, catchy and energetic soundtrack, humorous characters and, of course, fun, fast-paced Metroidvania gameplay make this title a must play for platformer fans or for those who are simply looking for an enjoyable time. It's very easy to get into, it's booming with charm and it's just a blast to play through!

author: {'steamid': '76561198125828837', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 849, 'last_played': 1555349666}
review: This is honestly my favorite 2d game. The platforming, combat, and abilites/ weapons you unlock flows together so well an the music backing it up is amazing. I love the characters and places you visit on your journey. This game is extremely fun and is the most enjoyable 2d game i have ever played.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971308505', 'num_games_owned': 143, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 721, 'last_played': 1493320220}
review:
This game is a classic platformer to its core. The humor is childish but makes you smile. The combat is satisfactory with items instead of spells. You also have some mazes and hidden areas for good measure. The story is also classic without being boring and the characters are fun and enjoyable. If you’ve played the earlier games this will make them feel slightly more important, but only because you see more of them. 

If you like platforming games and don’t mind that it isn’t for Linux, then this is a must buy.

My complaints are few but of existence. The items you use instead of spells are basically the same as before (except they’re items). This means that they have the same flaws as earlier. Some items are clearly better than others. The game is a bit too easy and the only way to make it harder is to go for the achievements. These achievements however, go fast to become only for the most hard core of gamers. 

This game is clearly aimed for younger audience than myself, looking at the characters, easy gameplay and childish jokes. Still they have an extreme sexualisation of all the female characters in the game. This is a problem from the older games that has been blown up to new heights here. For example, the better you beat the game the “sexier” the end picture will be. This is slightly disturbing and does bring forth the usual problems unnecessary sexualisation brings.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042687216', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 530, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 530, 'last_played': 1501589826}

author: {'steamid': '76561198363890430', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 812, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 803, 'last_played': 1632692999}
review:
A fun, colourful, creative, tongue-in-cheek, and charming metroidvania.  The plot is simple and straightforward, but is supported by a diverse cast that are enjoyable.  

The music and sprite-based art are fantastic as well.  The difficulty curve wavers at times (some bosses are cake walks while others spike in difficulty) and I wish I had one more area to explore to really use all the upgrades you obtain (the game ends shortly after you get all the power-ups).  However, when you beat the game you do unlock a new "Pirate Mode" which starts the game with all the upgrades already unlocked.

Would recommend to anyone who doesn't have a stick up their butt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198260695507', 'num_games_owned': 78, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1605552258}
review: This is a game I would recommend to anyone looking for a charming and fun Metroidvania. It has a wonderful cast of characters, an intriguing story, and a lot of amazing gameplay. Not to forget,  an incredibly remarkable soundtrack to accompany the entire adventure makes this a must buy for anyone looking for a great underrated series.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980547461', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 510, 'last_played': 1500749029}
review:
This game does everything a sequel needs to do, in the sense that it does everything better than its predecessor. 
The controls are tigher, the story more ambitious, and the writing much more hilarious in the *I Did not see that coming* kind of way.

Fans of either Metroidvanias or Shantae will find everything needed to satiate ones needs in this little gem of a game, that offers plently of challenging platforming, creative secrets to uncover, and a healthy dose of Pirate goodness, that makes owning the game worth every single Doubloon.

Arr, Me Heartys, i be proud to use me booty, on this here game, and i be recommeding, ye do the same, lest ye be Keelhauled, ye Scurvy Dogs!

author: {'steamid': '76561197989091200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 704, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 704, 'last_played': 1500587163}
review:
<Audio>
Let's start by saying when I saw "Jake Kaufmann" in the credits for the music, it all made sense. Shantae has some incredibly catchy tunes. Each island (seven-ish of them) has at least 2 completely different tracks, and most of them are extremely well done. I first learned who Jake Kaufmann was after I heard the amazing Shovel Knight soundtrack, and his work is just as good in this game. Where Shovelknight sounded more 8-bit, nintendo-y, this game has a bit more 16-bit era (sonic-ish?)  sounding tunes. Really great stuff.

<Art>
The art is colourful and cheerful, even in the desolate regions of the game. The main character, and many other supporting characters are basically made to be "waifu" material. It lays the suggestive themes on thick, and is unapologetic about it. Curvy/busty females are plentiful, and the game has fun with it. Whatever the "first" game did, this one has more, and again, I'm fine with that. Not every game needs super serious/realistic characters all the time. I don't think a single character in this game isn't some sort of caricature (stupid, goofy, scary, sexy, playful, etc) of something.

<Gameplay>
Another improvement on the first game, but don't expect a deep/complex game here. The game does enough to differentiate the gameplay, with different enemies/obstacles for each island to keep it playable. The level design is fairly plain, and overall the difficulty is relatively low. The boss fights bring the most spice to the games, but each one is "megaman"ish where they have 2-3 attacks/patterns that you'll learn, figure out their weakness, and exploit it. Pretty standard stuff, and it's done well. It's good, not great.

The difficulty spikes from 2-3/10 to 8/10 at the end with some challenging, precise platforming. I would've appreciated some of that challenge throughout the game, as the game has a lot going for it. The devs are fairly competent, and I think they have it in them to make this game go to the next level, and have created a good IP. I think what's lacking for this franchise to be great is to expand a little on the level design, add some items/rpg elements maybe... something. It's an enjoyable experience with alternate endings etc, but for me it stands as a "Good" game, not particularly a "Great" one... perhaps by design, as the game is ported from the Nintendo arcade? (3ds? wii-u?.. one of those), so perhaps they were trying to keep the game more "digestible". Comparing this game to something like Shovel Knight (this game is a bit more "open", but it's not exactly a metroid-vania), you'll know exactly what I mean by "simple levels".

<overall>
So ya, if you want a campy, fun platformer that isn't too too long, this is worth getting. Great music, "fanservice" artwork, and good platforming overall -- just not quite in the same echelon as shovel knight, and now, Hollow knight (different styles of games, but fair to compare overall quality to).
It really is an intellectual property that I think has a lot of promise. I hope they decide to make one of these games with a bit more breadth to it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198293209041', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1345, 'last_played': 1500495214}
review: Ótimo jogo, recomendo para fãs de plataforma e gráficos retrô. O jogo tem um bom foco em puzzles e exploração, trilha sonora memorável, e a ambientação também é ótima. A história do jogo é muito boa também, variando entre cenas engraçadas e mais sérias, e a caracterização dos personagens se assemelha ao estilo anime, fazendo com que eles sejam bastante carismáticos. Vale a pena, principalmente se estiver em alguma promoção.

author: {'steamid': '76561198303556102', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 994, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 939, 'last_played': 1512779094}
review:
Todo un tributo a los juegos en plataforma de la SNES, que llega al nivel de los clasicos de mario y megaman x.

Shantae es todo lo que un fan de este genero puede pedir y con mucha sabrosura por parte de nuestra heroina.
Super recomendable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081049785', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 860, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 679, 'last_played': 1500483811}
review:
I decided to finally complete last Shantae game available on PC - Shantae and the Pirate's Curse. And it was such a blast! It's like all my complaints about previous entries were listened to! With that being said, I'll jump into list of pros and cons!

[h1]Pros:[/h1]
[list]
  [*] Very good powers' progression. All of the powers feel useful even late in the gameplay, and none of them feel superfluous, like spider in HGH.
  [*] Great stage design - it compliments how the powers work, and there are a lot of very cleverly hidden secrets to find!
  [*] The length is much better than the other Shantae games - it took me about 10 hours this time to get 100% run without guides. It's much better than previous entries which were completed in about 6.
  [*] Graphic is very good - it's much better version of pixel art than presented in Risky's Revenge. And characters' pictures are also very good, almost on HGH level!
  [*] Cast of characters that take part in the story are fun, diverse, and great looking.
  [*] Sound design is ok - soundtrack does it's job. I think it's on similar level to the other Shantae games.
  [*] This time they attempted to do something different with the bosses - they aren't always just meat bags to beat. Sometimes they require something more, which is what I wanted from them in my previous reviews. Plus, they are challenging when attempting "don't get hit" achievements! Definitely best bosses in the series.
  [*] It is the most challenging game from the series when attempting a speedrun - it's not "impossibly hard", but it was the most interesting challenge posed by a Shantae game.
[/list]

[h1]Cons:[/h1]
[list]
  [*] This is basically the only one bad side for me - I missed some more interesting story. It's very barebones. And while characters are colorful, well designed and fun, story itself is very basic and forgettable. I think it was the only factor missing to make the game truly special.
[/list]

This game is a very good pseudo-metroidvania (there is split to stages similar to HGH). One of the better ones I've played! This is definitely the best entry in the series and the one I would recommend to newcomers - to see Shantae at it's best! I don't think story is important enough to make missing parts from Risky's Revenge a big deal. With that being said, my final number score is [b]9/10[/b]. The game is amazing, very well designed, I had a lot of fun with it and length was just ok for this genre. It missed some special factor to make it higher though, something memoriable, like a better story. Still, it's one of the better games I've played this year, and one of the better metroidvanias overall! If you want to play Shantae, I think this is the entry to check out!

On a final unrelated to score note, I think this game sets perfect ground for some sort of Risky's Spinoff - I'm not that much fan of her character, but the moveset established in this game is almost perfect, so it would be nice to have a continuation or expansion of it with another game where Risky as anti-heroine goes to hunt for some treasures akin to Wario... I think it would make a better game than making tons of transformations where only half of them is truly useful, like in Half-Genie Hero.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995458843', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 709, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 709, 'last_played': 1500402887}
review: Questo titolo è metroidvania a tema comico, con una particolare caratterizzazione dei personaggi femminili dalle curve ben vistose ed una colonna sonora veramente spettacolare. A prima vista potrebbe sembrare un semplice platform a scorrimento laterale, ma come un buon metroidvania che si rispetti, sarà fondamentale fare del backtracking per avere il completismo totale, sia per soddisfazione che per utilità. Backtracking che difficilmente sarà lungo e noioso, dato che la maggior parte degli oggetti nascosti è tutto sommato ben visibile, unito al fatto che la musica di gioco vi entrerà in testa come fosse un tormentone estivo, ma positivo. Informandomi in giro ho letto che è sconsigliato giocarlo come primo capitolo della serie, ma personalmente l'ho comprato in bundle. Considerando tutto ciò ed il fatto che è un genere che ho provato assai poco, consiglio il titolo a chi vuole tornare nel passato con delle vecchie meccaniche, ma con uno spirito decisamente vario.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060065484', 'num_games_owned': 437, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 671, 'last_played': 1670123654}
review:
La saga de Shantae vuelve con una edición que marcaría su regreso triunfal a la escena de los videojuegos, con hermosos rediseños muy bien ilustrados.

Empezando desde donde terminó la entrega anterior, Shantae ya no posee sus poderes de genio, y ahora deberá enfrentarse a sus enemigos con habilidades que irá adquiriendo en su camino y puede accerder con un simple botón, en lugar de transformarse tras una secuencia de baile. En este aspecto Shantae and the Pirate's Curse se diferencia de sus predecesores.

A pesar de ser un "metroidvania", el desarrollo es extremadamente linear. No hay lugar para la exploración abierta. El Shantae de Gameboy Color disponia de un mundo más abierto.

Hermosos sprites meticulosamente animados y una excelente banda sonora.

La curva de dificultad sube en pícada a la mitad del juego, como si los programadores hubiesen visto que el juego era muy corto y decidieran meter partes que no hcen más que retrasar al jugador.

Los jefes es extremadamente dificiles, pero se convierten en un chiste con el uso de objetos, pero no por mucho. De cualquier forma no creo que alguna vez podría derrotar alguno sin ayuda de un objeto especial.

La traducción en español es un tanto bizarra, tanto como traducir la palabra "key" (llave) como "clave", o usar el nombre "Sequin Land" la mayor parte del juego y luego traducirla como "Tierra Lentejuela" en pleno jefe final.

El juego es increiblemente accesible para aquellos con PC de bajo rendimiento. (A pesar de tener ciertos bajones de FPS al entrar y salir de una habitación, y toda una habitación del segmento final del juego tenía un claro ralentizamiento)

El control es excelente (si se usa controlador), cada función está asignada de manera accesible sin causar dolor a largo plazo en las manos.

El contenido de Shantae puede ser un poco inapropiado, ya sea con los voluptuosos diseños de los personajes femeninos y situaciones un poco incomodas, pero no deja de ser una aventura cargada de humor para toda la familia.

Shantae and the Pirate's Curse es una gran aventura.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164133982', 'num_games_owned': 128, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1091, 'last_played': 1578251636}

author: {'steamid': '76561198078065763', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 678, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 618, 'last_played': 1499820341}
review:
最早是看谜之声直播的时候看到的这款游戏，理所当然的被立绘吸引了2333
  然后就关注了这款游戏 乘打折入了。最近从别人手里收了一个手柄后决定就来玩玩这个游戏[strike] 舔立绘	[/strike]
当时看直播的时候觉得画风糙，但是自己玩起来的时候觉得其实还蛮不错的，作为像素风游戏。人物做的不错 特别是shantae的动作部分 比如 跳舞 扭屁股2333，看了看初代视频也是被gbc上面的shantae跳肚皮舞惊到。一直不动 shantae会撩头发，蹲下来会扭屁股 ，吸灯会跳肚皮舞。  

 " 我可以在城里看上一整天的肚皮舞"——？？？

  游戏本身的内容还是一个比较正经的卷轴跳台游戏，boss战前的3段跳台对我这种手残党简直是噩梦，不过死多了手感就记住了，完全靠感觉过去的- -。然而比起跳台内容 其实更有趣的是剧情，小故事挺多的，感觉打下来记住了不少人，ammo男爵手下的两个妹子手下(舔)，亦正亦邪然而又具有魅力的risky boots(舔)，元气系僵尸妹rottytops(舔 尸体？),绝对好姬友sky（舔）和她的男(？)朋友 wrench(鹦鹉?)， 百合大作233 cp太多了 sky，rottytops，riskyboots 各个的人设都一级棒 可舔[spoiler]神殿里的space princess的服装贼好舔 那段逃脱的苦受的值了	[/spoiler]。值得一提的是很多任务内容都在对话里 跳过了就很麻烦，毕竟没有任务提示系统，就得看攻略了。
 难度的话。。如果你以前通关过无数gba fc上的跳台游戏的话 这个应该是小case了。如果是萌新的话，有些关卡还是有点难度的，主要体现在跳台上。。拼硬实力。 而且存档点很关键 死了就会回上一个存档点 其他地方不会帮你存档。有时候浪死了特别心疼。对于正常人来说就是大部分还好 有时候有点挑战。boss感觉大部分都还好 就是那个龙的boss有点随机性，当时搞了我一会。
关卡设计的其实还是比较有意思的，当然我也是对比而言，比起那些纯跳台的解谜小游戏，就是隐藏我比较头疼，还是找攻略收集全小蝙蝠的。 

  游戏的音乐 能和立绘媲美了。完全不会厌，感觉这游戏内容虽然比较普通但是因为有这个音乐伴着让我觉得跳台也不会显得那么无聊。我比较喜欢 主城，rottytops和 bossbattle的bgm，主城波斯风音乐贼好听 再跳上一段肚皮舞 啧 我土猫收兵。话说挺多曲子就是gbc时代就有了 主城 和 bossbattle的曲子就是改编的 原来8bit的风格也特好听。这一作的音乐也是主要电子但又有点复古掌机游戏风的感觉，不过本来就是nds上移植过来的，有那种掌机音乐的感觉也挺正常。最近玩完了也是去YouTube上找remix 有个rottytops的remix贼魔性 最近洗脑循环中。

玩这游戏又让我回到了以前玩fc 的时候，插上卡带 ，坐在电视机前，拿着只有上下左右 ab键的手柄 疯狂受虐。 [spoiler]虽然好像本来就是掌机上的游戏	[/spoiler]

总体来说 我觉得是一款艺术享受高于游玩体验的游戏，然而说到底游戏本来就是艺术分割开来可能就不会有那么好的化学反应了。
好像特惠的时候经常会打折， 打折的时候值得一入，建议手柄游玩。

author: {'steamid': '76561198041756601', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 612, 'last_played': 1499588833}
review:
!!! Involves minor spoilers !!!   (don't read the blackened parts if you want to avoid spoilers)

Shortly:
Shantae and the Pirate's Curse is a direct sequel for the previous Shantae game (Shantae: Risky's Revenge 2010).

I'm not gonna go too deep with the story to avoid spoilers for the previous game, but the story takes place short time after the events of Risky's Revenge.

Gameplay is pretty much the same as it was in SRR, with few major changes here and there  ([spoiler]Shantae lost her Genie powers due to some events in the Risky's Revenge, hence she's unable to transform or perform magic in this game[/spoiler])



Pros:
+ Storywise its a good sequel
+ Comfortable 2D platformer
+ Exploration
+ Dungeons and bosses

Cons:
- Could have been longer
- Some bosses are too easy
- Some achievements are hard to obtain
- [spoiler]Shantae cannot transform or use magic due to events in the Risky's Revenge[/spoiler]

Do I recommend?
If you're into old-school 2D platformers, yes. If you played and liked the previous Shantae game, Risky's Revenge, definitely yes.

VerdicT: 7 / 10 - Good 2D platformer

author: {'steamid': '76561198109398586', 'num_games_owned': 768, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 557, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 557, 'last_played': 1499616703}
review:
This game is a lot of fun, it controls smoothly- my only complaing being unable to attack while running, but being able to do it while jumping makes things feel a bit inconsistant. The story is fun, and the characters are pretty funny. The only thing is that i cant get over how they have the women in this game look, it makes me feel like a creep when the sprites pop up for dialouge. 

Pros -
Fun story
cute characters
smooth platforming
nice sound track

cons-
The main character looks more at home in a sakura game than this cute platformer

that is honestly my only qualm with this game, it is very fun to play and the soundtrack is very pleasant to listen to.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133868531', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1563129787}
review: Just picked up, just started and now I need to get every title from this series. Wow, this is a fantastic throw boack platformer. I picked this up on a whim and this is arguably my favorite steam purchase. This title has a fantastic soundtrack, tremendous platforming action, (from what I've seen in my limited play) the chance to speedrun, I had a ton of fun playing. But the biggest surprise came from the dialog. Although almost the entire story is told in pop up static charcter illustrations with text boxes, I have laughed out loud reading along. The sense of humor it has about both itself and gaming in general is only matched with it's fantastic charm. Pick up if you're a fan of classic platforming, quick easy to learn hard to master titles, or games that remind you of the fun to be had in gaming this is a title for you. Worth the price easily!

author: {'steamid': '76561198135210576', 'num_games_owned': 280, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 810, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 810, 'last_played': 1499177581}

я прошёл эту игру и все её остальные части

от свинцовых туч раздавался гул
с потолка капало едкой водой и смрадный запах с подъезда заполнял прихожую
сосед активно сверлящий сегодня молчал и в комнате было темно

и чёт я приуныл

author: {'steamid': '76561198108276328', 'num_games_owned': 325, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 4069, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4042, 'last_played': 1590723261}
review:
After playing Risky's Revenge and Half Genie Hero on the Switch, I have to say this is the best one in the series! Being the first one I played, I didn't expect much, but fun gameplay, silly characters and easy to understand mechanics are really what make a game like this stand out. It's great that you can tell how the characters act by the way they move too. I think all games should have that as an introduction. Also, boob physics. Those are always good.

Pros
-Lots of times I said "Hey, that's a pretty cool mechanic"
-Great dialogue
-Mermaid Pixel Tiddies
-Riveting Final Boss
-Great game to achievement hunt
-Challenging Platforming
-Amazing Soundtrack 
-Great Artwork
-Funny
-Good Length

Cons
-Ummm....

Great Job Wayforward!

author: {'steamid': '76561198124415282', 'num_games_owned': 313, 'num_reviews': 115, 'playtime_forever': 735, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 734, 'last_played': 1522439074}

author: {'steamid': '76561198056938896', 'num_games_owned': 452, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 743, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 743, 'last_played': 1485585098}
review: This is the first and only Shantae game I've played as of yet, and I can just sum it up by saying it's an incredibly solid metroidvania. The gameplay is tight and has a really satisfying progression as you get more items to add to your arsenal. The characters are charming and play off each other really well as they are familiar with eachother from the past games. The game doesn't overstay its welcome and has a very enjoyable level of difficulty which is engaging yet manages to avoid becoming a frustrating experience. All in all, it's a great game that I'd highly recommend to anyone that is a fan of or interested in 2d platformers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198193707913', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 983, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 922, 'last_played': 1527459306}
review:
Essa análise vai ser de alguém que não tem muito costume em jogar platformers. :)

Os personagens são extremamente cativantes, você torce, quer ver as falas, as piadocas, as mudanças a cada ilha desbloqueada, o roteiro é bem feito e divertido.

As dungeons são bem diferentes e vão aumentando em grau de desafio (pelamor de deos, que dungeon difícil a do Pirate Masteeeeer). As considerei bem boladas, mas extremamente difíceis (para mim). 

Não é exatamente difícil pegar todos os itens do jogo, é bastante questão de explorar e os estágios secretos (hihi) são lindeza. 

Foi um jogo extremamente gratificante de passar (apesar de ter de parar por vezes de tanto morrer, mas não é um jogo que te pune demais) e gostoso de jogar.
